"(your name here)" you say.

"Eeeek, I'm middle aged. I look like my mom or one of her friends."

"Ma'am, you are 44 years old to be exact."

"How do you know that?" I ask, a bit curious and a little nervous of how he knows.

"I just do, as it is in my nature to know the exact status of any change in my

mansion. Oh, and by the way, the storm is due to break tomorrow morning and you can

leave then.

"Like this?"

"Well, actually you'll leave in whatever state you happen to be in at 11:00

tomorrow morning. If you don't like the new state of you life, come back in one month and

try again. If you like the new state of your life, keep it. The only time anyone ever finds this

place anyway, is when they want to make a major transformation in their life."

"I see, " I comment, staring at my reflection. I am still dressed in my high top

pink tennis shoes, blue jeans, orange tube top, and light blue leather jacket with fringes

hanging frrom the sleeves. Crow's feet show around my eyes, and fine lines are clearly

visible on my face. My cheekbones are more angular and stand out, and my large,

square shaped glasses and slightly saggy chest really bring to light how much older I am

now, as compared to when I lay down. There is even a hint of gray in my hair. "So, when I

leave here, whatever sort of shape I am in, my life will reflect the new me?"

"Correct on all accounts ma'am," he replied.

"Please, can we lay off on the ma'am. The name is Cindy, Cindy Jansen."

"Certainly Cindy, and dinner will be served in ten minutes. So, you can stay the

way you are, change into the outfit I've had placed on the bed for you which you might find

more suitable for a woman you age, or you can look in the closet and find something else.

However, just remember that if you choose to get an outfit from the closet, your body will

reflect the age of whoever last wore it.

" Thank you...mister...?"

"Prosperio, Hugo Prosperio...look forward to seeing you shortly for dinner." With that, he

exited the room and left me there to decide my next move.

Pushing myself up, I notice that with the added years (not to mention the added padding!) standing was a bit more exertion than I've been accustomed to. No worries, though.

I lean my head back through the door and look left and right. At the far left end of the hall, I see one of the mansion's many maids, standing stock still and as straight as she can be. I approach quietly.

"Excuse me... Miss?" the maid's posture softens a bit as she engages me.

"Yes, Cindy?"

"I was in the age room," I start, "and this is really hard to explain, but I need something to help me make very specific changes. See, I started out as an 18 year-old, and now I look a lot more like my mom, and that's started me thinking, 'What if, when I grow up, I age more like my aunt?' but I can't seem to find anything in the room that works like, you know... that."

"Of course!" she pushes forward at a brisk walk, "I believe there's something on the shelf in the closet that's just the ticket." She pushes into the room, heads straight for the closet and removes a small cardboard box. "This back up system is present in most rooms, for the more discriminating tastes. Just say what you are thinking into this microphone," she pauses and demonstrates with a flourish the small black tube before handing it to me.

"So I just say, like, 'blonde hair'?" my head tingles a bit as a turn towards the large mirror to see that my hair, now, is indeed very blonde.

122222222111211.content:
The last thing you had remembered was... "That's right, I was playing with that platform that altered my age, when I hit the switch down by accident... This must be what unbirth feels like... I'm... warm... and wet... Strange. I thought I would be dead." You open your eyes and find there is faint light before you, but you really can't see anything. "It's so dark... I was such a fool..." Suddenly, there was a commotion, and the liquid drained away. "What the!!" as she spun around, head down. Suddenly, she felt like she was being thrust down a passage. As a light crescendoed in the distance, something dawned on her. "Oh don't tell me... I'm being born!! Lovely... well at least I can breeze through school... and hopefully potty training."

Finally, she emerged back into the world, and right after exiting you look around to see just how you came back into the world. Your eyes go wide when you see your mom. It's your sister, Fiona, and last time you checked she was 10. Here she looked like she was 30!! Out of the corner of your eye you see the doctor about to slap your ass. With quick reflexes you somehow block his hand with yours. and give him a stern look. "Well alright then, I won't slap your rear, missy!!"

You try to say "Damn right!!" but all that comes out is gurgles, coos, other baby sounds, and a mew. "That's right, my voal cords haven't strengthened enough..." Wait, a mew?

The doctor says to the the parents, "Well, what do you want to call her?"

Your mother, whom, your now certain is your sister, says, "I want to name her after my sister (your name here), who disappeared 20 years ago. This is for you, sis..."

"I'm right here..." Suddenly, an odd sensation catches your attention, and a furry limb flashes in your sigh for a moment, twitching about.

Your new father asks, "Will there be anything we need to do special since our child contracted that kemonomimi virus in utero?"

"As it stands, studies show infants and toddlers with the virus for the most part grow up no different from normal girls, save for their enhanced strength, speed, and senses. Be careful not to hurt their tails, as it seems they are very sensitive, and their brains are wired to need them for balance. However, be ready to deal with the physical attributes of puberty sooner than normal parents, as all the girls born kemonomimi seem to start the physical changes of puberty earlier, some as early as seven or eight, but only become sexually active in even remotely interested in sex later than regular human girls, often not until they are at least fifteen. More importantly, as I should fill you in on this new data, though that when they do gain an interest in sex they will not only be attracted to humans but animals corresponding to their animal parts as well, as shown in the eldest kemonomimi girls, so if you have any male cats at home, or plan to own any, consider neutering them before she becomes a teenager because if she becomes enamored with him in that special way, you might become a grandma sooner than you want to."

"You mean our little girl could fall in love with a cat? And have his babies? Man, give me the good old days when my folks worried I was gay or not... stupid comet..."

"What the hell happened to me?" you wonder. "First I age myself into unbirth, then I somehow get reborn, by my kid sister of all people, 20 years in the future apparently, and it seems now there's been some weird catgirl virus between the time I got unbirthed and now, and I came down with it in the womb... Man, is Fiona going to freak when I start talking..."

Well, there you are, somehow now the child of your sister, and now a catgirl, but sticking around here may get dull in the plot department. What happens next?

1231221112.content:
Sitting in your own mess, reduced to the physical abilities of an overgrown baby you feel tears well up in your eyes but force yourself not start crying. You're not sure you'll be able to stop if you let yourself start. You force yourself to take a few deep breaths and think about the situation. This isn't how you want to be but with all the strange things you've seen in the short time you've been here surely there must be a way, or even several ways, to fix this. Seizing that ray of hope you resolve to start looking for a way to fix yourself.

Which is easier said than done. Not only are your legs too weak to support you properly, forcing you to crawl around to get anywhere, but your arms are too weak to pull yourself up or pull things towards you. You do your best to search the Age room but if there's anything useful in here it's out of your reach or behind one of the closed doors you can't manage to open. The only open door is the one leading out of the room. You look around again but no other options appear. You're going to have to explore more of the mansion if you want to find anything. Before leaving you look at yourself in the mirror again. In a desperate attempt to make yourself look less infantile you take off the bonnet and pacifier. You're now naked except for an obviously soiled adult nappy but you look a little more like an adult. Maybe. If you could walk rather than crawl.

You set off into the hallways of the mansion. You don't know if it's the change in perspective but nothing looks familiar and though you try and retrace your steps you don't see any sign of the paintings you passed before and find yourself crawling along a long corridor with no distinguishing features. The few doorways you encounter are closed, unlabelled and you can't push them open or reach the door handles. It's a good thing the carpets are nice and soft against your bare skin because crawling about like this is bad enough with the feel and smell of your loaded nappy, if just moving yourself along was painful you'd probably give up in despair.

You're not sure how long you spend searching but eventually you find yourself slowing down. It might be the effects of the water or it might be normal exhaustion from crawling around for so long but either way your limbs a feeling even less able to support you than before. You decide to take a break and push yourself into a sitting position. It's probably a bad sign of how used to the messy nappy you're getting that the feel of sitting in your own mess again barely registers but you can't bring yourself to care. You're tired and, as your rumbling stomach reminds you, hungry and by this point you just want to find anything at all. Tears start to well up in your eyes and this time you don't have the energy to stop them.

You sit there, not quite crying but definitely leaking from the eyes a bit, for a minute or so before you become aware of the front of your nappy growing warm. Looking down you see the yellow patch on the white crotch of the adult nappy spreading and growing darker. You barely have time to process that you're wetting yourself again before the rumble in your stomach abruptly moves lower and your bowels start emptying themselves as well. This is all just too much to bare and you give in and start full out wailing from shame and discomfort.

Eventually your sobs die down again and a new noise catches your attention. Through eyes still blurry with tears you can just see...

12312211121.content:
Having someone else see you in this state is humiliating enough to prompt you to start crying again and the next thing you know warm arms are around you and something is placed into your mouth. You've started sucking at it before you consciously recognise it as an adult sized dummy but it's very soothing and at this point you want comfort more than you care about being a big baby. The maid strokes your pink hair with a gentle hand and says;

"Oh, sweetheart, you're really in big mess aren't you. Lets go and get you changed shall we?"

Elation fills you finally getting somewhere and you nod and make a noise of assent around the dummy.

"Are you all right to walk sweetheart?" The maid asks in a kind voice. You shake your head, it's embarrassing but even ignoring your weakened legs you're too worn out to from crawling for so long to even attempt moving under your own power at a the moment.

"Ok, that's fine." The maid says. "Up we go." Despite the fact the maid is a normal looking adult woman and you are an averaged sized 18 year old girl the maid is easily able to lift you as she stands up. You instinctively wrap your arms and legs around her and she sets off down the corridor, carrying you as easily as if you were a normal sized baby rather than an oversized one. Part of you wants to protest that you're not a baby but most of you doesn't care if it leads to you getting some help.

The maid obviously knows her way around the mansion and it only takes a few minutes for her to reach her destination. The room she carries you into is fairly small and contains an adult sized changing table the maid sets you down on. While she looks in the cupboard beneath the changing table you look around the room. There's nothing in it but the table, a sink and a bin and the décor is very childish. Asides from the scale of the changing table the room could easily be part of a babies nursery. Given what you've seen in this place and your own state you suspect it is part of a nursery, just for much bigger babies than normal. You hope you're not going to end up as one of them in the long term.

The maid looks at you and says "I'm afraid they don't have any adult nappies here. Are you alright with a more childish design? Still sized for you, obviously."

You want to protest the need for a new nappy but two messy accidents since you were splashed by the water make it plain you need one for the moment. And at this point as long as you get out of your current filthy nappy soon you don't care what the one you're changed into looks like. Since you're feeling calmer now you take the dummy out of your mouth to reply. The noise that comes out of your mouth is only vaguely like a word but the maid seems to understand and takes a selection of adult-sized nappies out of the cupboard for you to choose from. They all have infantile looking designs and are noticeably bulkier than what you're currently wearing. You pick a pink one with sparkly fairies on, mainly because the colour matches your hair, and then position yourself on the table, ready for changing.

The maid un-tapes your soiled nappy and sets to cleaning you up, apparently unconcerned about the smell. After everything your crotch and bum are pretty filthy and it takes a while to get everything clean and ready for a fresh nappy. Oddly, despite the fact a complete stranger is wiping your messy private regions you don't feel anything but relived to be clean. No shame, humiliation or even excitement. Eventually you're all clean and soon the maid is taping your new nappy shut and checking for leaks.

"'ank 'ou" You say gratefully once the maid announce your nappy change all done.

"You're welcome sweetheart." The maid replies. "Do you need anything else?" You open your mouth to reply but an extremely loud rumble from your stomach answers first.

"Sounds like someone's hungry. It's tea time now so shall we get you something to eat?" The maid asks. You agree enthusiastically and she picks you up again and carries you through the mansions halls. Soon you arrive at....
12312211121.title: A maid approaching

123122111211.content:
The maid carries you through a pair of double doors and into a large, well decorated dinning room. The centrepiece of the room is a long table which a number of maids are currently setting with a large selection of cutlery. Your caretaker pauses, looking for someone, and a dry voice from behind you says.

"I see you've decided to get in touch with your inner infant miss." The maid doesn't seem surprised by the voice but you start in her grip. A moment later Lord Prosperio walks into view. "Shannon, while I have a word with our young guest please go and fetch a high chair and the other necessaries so she can join the other guests at the table when they get here."

"Of course sir." Shannon says, lowering you to the floor and striding off purposefully.

While you are processing what's happened Lord Prosperio bends over slightly and says in a quiet voice. "You've gotten yourself into a messy situation haven't you? Normally if guests damage things I leave them to deal with the consequences on their own but since it was an accident and only a small thing I'm prepared to offer you a deal. The guests will shortly be gathering here for dinner. It will be quite a large meal tonight and I expect it will last for at lest two hours. If you're a good girl the whole time then you'll get a present afterwards that will help you with your current condition. If you don't behave yourself.... well, bad little girls don't get presents do they.

You consider this and attempt to ask a question. You still can't produce more than baby babble with a few recognisable noises but the owner of this place seems to understand regardless and he answers.

"By behaving I mean that you will sit in your high chair at the table with your fellow guests and myself without complaint for the whole meal and while doing so you will eat the food you are given without a fuss and behave nicely towards the other guests. Obviously in your current state conversing with your fellows is not really an option but I would expect you to be cheerful and as polite as you can be."

You think about this. On the one hand, behaving for the meal will effectively mean acting like a baby in the body of an adult in front of complete strangers for hours. Also you'll be naked save for a childish nappy in front of all of them the whole time as well. On the other hand the promise of help fixing yourself seems worth swallowing your pride for. Plus you're really hungry and who knows if you'll get fed if you misbehave here.

You look towards the table as you mull over the offer and watch Shannon and some other maids setting up an oversized high chair at one of the places. You deiced that you're going to....
123122111211.title: The main dining room

1231221112111.content:
You burble an assent to Lord Prosperio's offer.

"Excellent. Now, I suspect you'd like to be dressed more appropriately for dinner?" You can't agree fast enough with the lord's question. "Very good. Shannon, the young miss would like to get dressed up for dinner. Since there's still a little time left yet before the meal starts please help her with that. The exceptionally pink dressing room is near the dinning room at the moment and should have what you need." As Prosperio speaks Shannon comes over and picks you up. She mummers an assent to the instructions and carries you easily out of the room.

The room she takes you to is indeed very pink and contains a bench, a dressing table, several wardrobes and a number of mirrors. Shannon opens one of the wardrobes to reveal a number of dresses. They are universally pink and childish in style but big enough for someone your age.

"Which dress do you want sweetie?" Shannon asks you, somehow balancing you on her hip effortlessly despite your near equal sizes. You look over the dresses and pick one with a faerie theme. None of the dresses are going to make you look less like an overgrown baby so you might as well go for one that matches your nappy. The maid takes your pick out then sets you down on the bench and hangs it nearby, before heading over to a set of draws for a moment and rummaging through them. She returns with a bra and a set of tights, both also pink and with faeries on and sets to helping you get dressed.

Well, less helping and more dressing you like the big baby you currently are. You don't have the coordination to dress yourself, and all you can do is move as requested while she puts the clothes on you. It doesn't take long and it's a relief to be properly dressed again once it's done. It's warmer and the bra especially is a great comfort after having your bare breasts bouncing around on display. Shannon produces a pair of pink Mary-Janes from below the bench and puts the on your feet, then retrieves a hair brush and some (pink) bobbles from the dresser and pulls your hair into pigtails.

Once everything is finished she picks you up and carries you over to the mirrors. Your legs still won't support you but she places her hands under your arms and takes most of your weight, allowing you to 'stand' and view your new look. The girl in the mirrors might have an 18 year-olds body but there's no way anyone looking at her is going to think anything other than 'baby', especially since the dress and tights seem to emphasise the bulk of her nappy rather than hide it. Still, it's much better than being near-naked and it's not like wearing just a nappy would look any more adult. You make happy noises at Shannon to let her know you like it and the maid smiles at you.

"Do you want to walk back sweetheart?" She asks you. "It's not far and I'll help you." You agree, eager to reclaim even that little of your maturity. Between your still weak legs, lack of coordination and the way the thick nappy effects your gait it's more toddling than walking and you'd never have managed it without Shannon's arms holding you up but you're still a little proud when you walk through the dining room doors together. Some of the other guests have arrived while you were being dressed and you quail slightly - they all look like perfectly normal people from here while you are unmistakeably an adult baby - but you force yourself to look cheerful and keep moving towards the table.

There are a few glances towards you while Shannon lifts you up puts you in your high chair but none of them seem to think it unusual enough to comment on, or even pause in their conversations. You begin to hope that you'll make it through dinner without being completely humiliated after all.
1231221112111.title: Be a good girl

12312211121111.content:
Your fears of being the only weird one at the table are quickly assuaged as more guests arrive. The next people to come through the doors are a mermaid riding on the back of a centaur woman, which again draw no remark from the people who were here when you returned. It does provoke a flurry of action from the maids waiting at the edges of the room to ensure they are comfortably accommodated at the table though. It's a pattern that continues as more guests make their way in. In addition to a number of normal looking people of various ages, genders and ethnicities, some of whom look slightly surprised, by the surroundings and occasionally themselves, a variety of unusual looking people arrive. Giant people, tiny people, people so fat they can barely fit through the doors and people with all sorts of animal traits, plus even stranger besides. They all come through the doors and are seated at the table with no more fuss than it takes for the maids to ensure they have a comfortable seat and appropriate place settings.

Mindful of the need to be 'good' and of the fact you don't want people goggling at your state, you do your best not stare at anyone. It's admittedly a little hard, since no one tries to engage with you, leaving you with nothing to do while you wait for dinner to start. It's not that people don't approach you, you get a number of smiles and comments on how pretty or cute you look but once it becomes apparent you're limited to baby talk to reply people move on. In fact, you realise, you're being treated like a normal baby at a dinner party. Worthy of a little cooing over but not someone to engage with. It's a little disheartening to have your adulthood so casually and completely dismissed but you force yourself to interact cheerfully with people and hold on to the hope of a return to normal to avoid looking moody when no one's talking at you.

As the guests arrive it becomes clear that your high chair is at the children's end of the table. If people arrive in groups they tend to sit together but all the unaccompanied guests who appear younger than their mid-teens are being seated at this end, along with a few who appear older but by their actions are obviously children mentally. The chairs to either side of you go unfilled for awhile, none of the children apparently being keen on siting by a baby. You resist the urge to pull a face at one boy of around five years of apparent age who declares his refusal to sit next to a baby in a loud voice when a maid subtly tries to steer him there. The space to your left is eventually filled when a group of four preteen girls cat girls arrive and it's the only place they can sit together. The one who ends up next to you is steered there by her friends with some gentle teasing about being nappy buddies and you can't resist looking sideways at her, where a closer look allows you to see the top of a nappy peaking out of the waistband of her skirt. You simile at your fellow sufferer in padding but she's too busy trying to tease her companions back to notice. The seat to your right goes empty until the table is nearly full and a girl literally flies through the doors and looks around frantically before darting over to settle into it. She's physically older than most of guests at this end, probably around 18, and she is unmistakeably a faerie, abet a human sized one. She's red faced and panting and has obviously hurried to get here before dinner starts. She actually ends up hovering out of the chair when a maid hurries over with one that has a back that accommodates her gossamer wings.

Once she's recovered a bit the faerie girl tries to strike up conversation with the people next to her. The pair of multi-coloured of teenagers across from her only have eyes for each other and the young boy next to her, so fat as to be almost perfectly spherical, scoffs rudely and ignores her but he make a cheerful noise in response and she takes this as an invitation to turn to you and start talking. A lot. Very fast. In short order you learn that her name is Max, she actually is an 18 year old girl, she's been at the mansion for about a week and she's been through a number of transformations before finding the faerie one a few days ago and deciding to stick with it. She's halfway through a story about her first day here involving an octopus in a fountain (you think), when she stops abruptly and says,

"Sorry, I've been babbling on and haven't let you get a word in edgeways." You make a reassuring noise in reply "Still, I should give other people a chance to speak. What's your story?" You're momentarily stumped about how to reply with your highly limited verbal abilities and eventually resort to waving your arms vaguely at yourself and babbling a bit.

After a few moments of this Max says, "Ah, you can't talk at the moment can you? I should have realised sooner, what with the whole baby thing, but you'd be surprised in this place." Unlike the other guests, Max doesn't take this as a cue to ignore you or treat you like you're completely infantile, but actually works on having a conversation with you. Through means of yes/no questions, counting on fingers and a few clumsily copied gestures you manage to communicate that you're also 18 and a girl, both currently and normally, that you didn't intend to end up in your current state and that you're not happy with it. Getting your name across proves tricky and Max is about to start guessing names when a gong rings. The room goes silent and people turn towards Lord Prosperio at the head of the table. He welcomes everyone and says he hopes everyone is enjoying their stay, then declares that dinner is served. As a parade of maids start bringing out the first course you look around the table and see that you're the only one in a high chair. Even the youngest looking children, two or three years of age, are in normal chairs tall enough to reach the table comfortably. The feeling that you stand out as a big baby is not helped by a maid arriving to put a bib (pink, with faeries) around your neck, especially since she doesn't ask if you want it, unlike her colleagues who approach others do. It really doesn't help that no one else you can see ends up with a bib, but you remember the deal and avoid complaining.

The first course is soup and you are slightly miffed to be given a bowl of tomato soup without being asked, unlike those around you. Surprisingly, before Max picks she asks her server why you weren't asked. The maid replies that due to your current circumstances Lord Prosperio was concerned about how some of the ingredients would effect you, so you are not being offered certain dishes, but will be allowed to choose for those courses which have multiple safe options. Given that Max gets a toadstool and daffodil soup you can't say the concern is unwarranted, especially since it makes her teeth and tongue glow yellow briefly. On the bright side you get the same size portion as Max does and everyone on the children's end gets a plastic bowl with a pattern on it, so you're not being singled out there, even if your spoon is obviously a sized up toddlers utensil and one of the maids cuts up and butters your bread roll for you.

The table is briefly near-silent as people apply themselves to their first course. You end up grateful for the design of your spoon and the presence of the bib as your hand-eye coordination turns out to have been almost completely removed by the water effects now and you end up with soup smeared around your mouth (and some on the end of your nose) and dripped over the tray of your high chair. You're briefly dismayed by the mess you're making but Max nudges you and indicates the boy next to her who is making a considerably worse mess of himself and his surroundings and you decide not to worry about it. At least you're trying and at least you're not doing it on purpose. Your decision is reinforced a moment later when the cat girls start lapping up their soup with their tongues alone, a process which quickly coats their muzzles in soup.

Once you stop worrying and enjoy it the soup tastes wonderful and you soon finish it. The girl on your left finishes at the same time and you catch each others eye and find yourselves sharing a giggle at your mutual soup covered faces. Afterwards she looks like she's going to say something, then pauses, then starts then pauses again. Before she can make another attempt she starts hiccupping bubbles, along with her friends. While you're all looking bemused at this Max leans over and breaks the silence with a comment about they plant that apparently causes this, which leads, once the hiccupping dies down, to a conversation between the six of you about some of the weird food in this mansion. You can't really contribute but everyone makes an effort to include you and you pass the time happily until the first course is complete and the maids begin clearing things away. In addition to clearing places they have no hesitation in wiping faces clean as well and Max looks slightly smug about being the only one in your little group to avoid getting a baby wipe applied to her face. Until one maid gives the rest of you a wink and gives her mostly clean face a quick wipe anyway, to general giggling.
12312211121111.title: Dinner begins

123122111211111.content:
Once the giggling dies down the cat girls introduce themselves as Rosie, Daisy, Cindy and Lilly. Rosie is petite, red-furred and almost as much of a motor mouth as Max, Daisy is golden-furred, notably muscular and quite boisterous, Cindy is slender and white-furred with tiger stripes and a posh accent and Lilly is black-furred, quiet, and the one wearing a nappy. Max gives her name and explains you haven't been able to say what yours is and Rosie says that they all made up the names they're using, so way don't they make up one for you to use for now. Deciding it would be easier than people trying to guess you agree and are quickly dubbed 'Pixie'. After being asked by Cindy why she's sitting with the children despite apparently being physically and mentally adult, Max says that that's no reason not to take the chance to enjoy yourself and she's taking her impromptu stay in the mansion as a chance to forget about the pressures of being an adult. This obviously strikes a chord with all four girls but the conversation is interrupted at that point by the arrival of the second course. True to what was promised earlier you are given a choice this time, if less of one than the others. You go for a ham and melon starter since the other option, chilli prawns, is apparently quite spicy.

Given the expression Lilly, the only one to go for the spicy option, makes when she puts the first prawn in her mouth you're pretty sure that avoiding it was for the best. You're aware enough to your current limitations that you don't object when the maid who brings your food cuts it into bite sized pieces before departing, and after a few less than successful efforts with your fork decide to just eat with your fingers. The thought strikes you of how infantile you must look, sitting in a high chair with a bib over a childish dress and eating without any pretence of being able to use cutlery, but by this point you're getting used to ignoring such thoughts. Your situation is what it is and won't be changing till after dinner, so you may as well not worry and just enjoy what you can, like the company and the nice food. It helps that no one is mocking you for your current state and once Max explains what she knows of your situation to the cat girl quartet they are all quite sympathetic to your plight.

Once she's finished her food Rosie tells you and Max about the four cat girls circumstances. You're not surprised to lean that they were originally girls or that they knew each other before they came to the mansion but you are surprised to learn that they're all postgraduate students at university - nothing about them hinted they were any older than the 10 or so they appeared to be. Apparently they were on a road trip together and their car broke down outside the mansion very late two nights ago while they were rather lost. They couldn't get a phone signal and when they approached the mansion to ask for help Lord Prosperio offered to let them stay overnight. They were tired enough to accept without thinking about it much and woke up the next morning their current ages. Since they were meant to be on holiday they decide to embrace the opportunity to enjoy a second childhood. They found the room that turned them into cat girls not long after and they've stayed like that since. They've experimented with other transformations a bit but they've mostly stuck to non-transforming amusements. Lilly's padded state is the result of one of the games they played earlier today, which let them choose a forfeit for the loser at the start. Given that being incontinent for a week was apparently one of the most mild forfeits on offer you think you'll be quite happy never playing that particular game. Explaining that leads into a retelling of the scramble to find an appropriate undergarment for Lilly after the end of the game when they realised it wasn't going to provide one, which Lilly obviously finds embarrassing but bares with good humour, and the six of you converse happily as the meal continues through a third and fourth course.

As the fourth course is cleared away the quiet speculation about how many courses the meal will have (the way dinner works is apparently different each day) is interrupted by a strange noise, followed shortly by a bad smell and Lilly blushing enough to be visible through her fur. It takes a moment but you realise what must have happened and giver her a sympathetic smile, which she returns with a slightly watery one of her own. The others are also sympathetic once they realise, though Daisy doesn't get it until a blushing Cindy hisses it in her ear, but you're still surprised when Daisy asks how you're doing. Not as surprised as you are once you think about it and suddenly notice the current state if your own nappy. You haven't messed yourself again but you're quite wet and it feels like you have been for a while.To show solidarity with Lilly you manage an "I wet" that comes out surprisingly clearly but though you don't show it you're a little worried. You've been presently distracted by the food and the company but being so used to the feeling of a wet nappy already that it doesn't register as unusual until you think about it specifically can't be a good sign and the fact your control is apparently so poor you can wet heavily, and possibly more than once, without noticing it happening isn't encouraging. You hope what ever help Lord Prosperio provides at the end of this meal is effective. The maid taking yours and Lilly's plates pauses to say quietly to you both that there will be a break after the next course and there will be chance to be changed then, if you can wait till then. You're pretty sure this is just the maids attentiveness informing her you need to know this, and not the state of your nappies being obvious to anyone. You hope so anyway. In any case, not wanting to draw attention to the need you both say you'll wait.

As long as you don't let yourself get to focused on it your nappy is absorbent enough to be quite comfortable despite being wet and you manage to make it through the fifth course without being too bothered by it. Lilly does her best as well but given how much she squirms in her seat you can tell she's not happy about it. As the plates are cleared away Lord Prosperio stands up to announce there will be a brief break and encourages people to take the opportunity to stretch their legs and mingle a bit. As people get up and start moving around a maid comes over to take you out of the high chair, and you're slightly surprised to see Shannon, the one who helped you earlier. As she lifts you up she explains that they're encouraging all the younger guests to go to the bathroom during the break and says there will be a toilet available in the changing room if anyone wants to come with her while she sorts out you and Lilly and avoid the crowds. Everyone elects to do so, which makes the room she takes you to a little crowded, and it's a bit embarrassing to have an audience while you're having your nappy changed but everyone politely looks away, and it's nice to have the distraction of conversation. Shannon has you changed quickly and then helps Lilly with her nappy, somehow managing to assist and get her cleaned up in short order without making it seem like Lilly can't handle herself. She does, after a quiet conversation, convince Lilly to accept a bulkier nappy than her old one, which has a black cat print rather than being plain. Shannon is effective enough that you're both changed well before the other four have all had their turn on the toilet, and she makes a point of ensuring everyone washes their hands before you leave. She brings you back to the dinning room quickly and swiftly gets you strapped back into your high chair, then pauses just long enough to be thanked by the six of you before departing.

You all soon settle back into talking as you were earlier and good company keeps you entertained until the arrival of the sixth course and then beyond as the remainder of dinner passes enjoyably.
123122111211111.title: Continuing dinner

123122111212.content:
The maid pushes open a discrete door and carries you through into a huge, bustling kitchen, white uniformed chefs dashing about as they prepare an immense array and amount of food, maids standing out in their dark dresses as they dart in and out to retrieve particular dishes and carry the out through the main doors on the other side of the room. It's all so busy that no one seems to notice you being brought in, which you're very grateful for, given your rather embarrassing state.

The woman carrying you skirts the edges of the chaos and heads down a passage off to one side that contains a number of curtained alcoves. As she walks down, apparently looking for one in particular, she explains;

"Given the state you were in when I found you, I thought you'd probably like a little peace and quiet with your meal, rather than eating with the other guests in the main dining room."

You nod and make enthusiastic noises. You definitely don't want to sit down for a meal with other people in your current condition. The maid laughs as she pushes aside the pink curtain of an alcove and steps inside.

"That's a yes to that then. Plus, dinner's not actually being served for another half an hour, and given how much your tummy's been rumbling, I don't think you want to wait that long to eat, do you sweetheart?"

You agree enthusiastically again as the maid sets you down on a seat.

"Okay, you just sit here and be a good girl for a few minutes and I'll be back with some lovely yummies for your grumbly tummy sweetheart."

It's not until the maid has left the alcove that you realise the seat she put you down on belonged to an adult sized high-chair, one you're now strapped quite securely into. You make a half-hearted attempt to undo the buckle across your chest, but due to your weakened arms or some property of the chair itself, or both, you can't budge the clasp even slightly. At least the straps are nice and soft and don't rub much against your bare breasts.

You take a look around the alcove while you wait, but there's not much to see. There's a notch in the wall that you can just barely make out behind and to one side, but you can't twist enough to see if there's anything inside it. There's a normal chair just across from your high-chair, and a small table just off to the side of it, but there's nothing interesting about either. Even the curtain is uninteresting, a thick pink sheet that makes it completely impossible to see anything of the corridor outside.

With nothing to distract you, you find your thoughts going to the nappy around your waist. It feels much nicer and more comfortable than the adult nappy you were wearing before, and not just due to being clean. It's made of softer material, and so thickly padded you can barely feel the seat of the high-chair beneath you through it. Plus the pink colour and pretty fairy pattern look a lot better than the plain white design of the adult nappy.

You're pulled from your contemplation by the return of the maid, carrying a large tray of food. The plates and bowls are of a childish style, made of thick, colourful plastic, but are also all adult sized, containing generous portions. The tableware might be a little embarrassing, but at least you're not going to go hungry.

After the maid sets the tray down on the table, she takes a small bottle with an eyedropper off it and says;

"I've noticed that you're not too happy about not being able to talk sweetheart. The stuff in this bottle will help with that, but it won't get you up to an adult level, only about equal to a five year old at most. And it'll make you more babyish in other ways, probably quite a bit compared to what you gain. Do you want a dose?"
123122111212.title: Fed in the kitchen

1231221112121.content:
You only think about it for a few moments before nodding empathically. Being able to communicate beyond babbling and clumsy gestures would make your situation much more bearable. Given you don't have the strength or coordination to do anything for yourself, you're not too worried about the side effects. You're already incontinent and basically helpless - how much more babyish can you get?

At your nod, the maid says;

"Okay sweetie. Open your mouth and say 'Ahh' for me."

You quickly do so as the maid takes the eyedropper out of the bottle. She squeezes a few drops of its contents on to your tongue, which begins to tingle. The tingling quickly begins to spread, to your mouth and throat, and then to your whole head. Your feel your thoughts growing fuzzy and disconnected, and soon your awareness is nothing but a jumble of vague feelings and impressions.

When your head clears again, you find yourself slumped slightly in your high-chair, drool running from your mouth. Straightening, you try to wipe away some of the drool with your hand, but your lack of control means that you just end up smearing it across your face.

"Yucky."

You mutter, then start. It was a rather childish phrasing, and something sounds off about your voice, but you just spoke in an actual word rather than babbling.

"I is speak? I is speak!"

Your word choice and pronunciation are basically a toddler's, and your voice sounds like it belongs to a three year old rather than an eighteen year old, but you can talk again.

"Yes you can sweetheart."

You look up at the sound of her voice to see the maid sitting in the chair opposite you, the bottle nowhere in sight. You're not quiet sure how you didn't notice her sooner, given that she's right in front of you, but who cares? She gives you a pretty smile and leans forward to wipe the drool of your face and hand with a baby wipe, then says;

"Now that you can talk again, can you tell me your name?"

"I is Lizzy."

You normally go by Elizabeth, rather than a nickname, but you can't manage to say your full name no matter how much you try. You vaguely remember going by Lizzy when you were little anyway.

"It's nice to meet you, Miss Lizzy. My name is Sharon. Can you say 'Sharon'?"

"Sha. Sha. Sha on. Tha ron. Thar on. Tharon."

You try, but you can't quite manage to say her whole name without lisping, stuttering or otherwise mispronouncing it. You can't help but pout slightly at your failure, but Sharon gives you a warm smile and you don't feel quite so bad about it.

"How about you go for something simpler, sweetheart? How about 'Sha''? Are you alright with just 'Sha''?"

"Yes Sha'." You respond, smiling back.

"Very good. Okay sweetie, I just need you to do one thing for me. Can you think about yourself and tell me if anything feels different form how you did before I gave you the potion?"

You screw up your face in concentration as you consider this. Does anything feel different? It takes you a minute before you notice something. Before, you were very aware of the fact you were nearly naked, and very embarrassed by the idea of people seeing you. Now the only thing you feel about your undressed state is that it's a little cold. As you explain this, haltingly, to Sharon, you realise something else. You're no longer upset about your infantile state. You know it's not how you're meant to be, or how you wanted to be, but you're not distressed about it any more. It's just how you are at them moment. You tell Sharon about that as well.

She nods and says;

"Right. That was very good explaining, sweetie. There are a few more things to check, but we can do those later. For now, I suspect you're more than ready for your tea."

As if on queue, your stomach gives a loud rumble.

"Well, your tummy is certainly ready for something yummy. Do you want to feed yourself, Lizzy, or would you prefer I do it?"
1231221112121.title: Take the dose

12312211121212.content:
You consider trying to feed yourself, but after trying to touch your nose results in smacking yourself on the cheek, you decide it won't be worth the hassle. Or the likely mess.

"Sha' feed, 'lease."

Sharon smile at your request and stands, retrieving a large pink plastic bib from the alcove behind you and fastening it around your neck. She also picks up a container of baby wipes, which she places on the table where the food is. Then she selects a bowl from the platter of food and places it on the tray of your high-chair, before moving her chair forward so she's in easy reach of you. The bowl is pink plastic, and contains a fairly generous amount of a thick red soup. Less than you would normally have, even as a starter, but from the number of items still on the platter, you suspect this will be a meal of several courses.

Sharon sits down, placing a pink sippy-cup full of some kind of juice down as she does so. Dipping an oversized children's spoon into the soup, she smiles at you again.

"Open wide, sweetie. Here comes the num-num's train."

You do your best to cooperate with Sharon, but unfortunately your body is currently not cooperating fully with you. Between the times you misjudge the path of the spoon and move wrong, and the times where you end up dribbling some soup out despite your best efforts, it's a good thing you're wearing a bib. Otherwise your chest would be smeared with tomato soup too, rather than just your face. Still, Sharon is good humoured about it, and doesn't do anything in response to you making a mess other than cleaning your face off with a baby wipe occasionally. The tomato soup itself is some of the best stuff you've ever tasted, and you're not sure what the juice in the sippy cup is, but it tastes wonderful, and you drink it down eagerly whenever Sharon offers you the cup. You're petty sure there's something unusual about the cup actually, since you drink from it lots without the level of juice inside changing. That barely registers as weird at this point though, and you quickly forget about it in favour of eating, making happy noises as you do so.

After the soup comes little cubes of melon and small pieces of thin sliced ham. Then sausage, mash and onion gravy. Then fish fingers, peas and chips. Then pork with applesauce, stuffing, roast potatoes and carrots. You suppose you must have been hungrier than you thought because you make it through five courses and a considerable amount of juice with ease. Sharon turns each dish into manageable, bite-sized portions and feeds it to you, smiling at your not always successful attempts to help and giving you juice at regular intervals. Each course is as wonderful as the last, and for a long time you think about little beyond eating the next tasty mouthful. Throughout the whole, lengthy, process Sharon remains kind and patient, offering gentle encouragement, but not hurrying you or looking at all bothered be the inevitable mess.

Looking around your babified room, you realize that there is no way back to the mansion or your adult life now that the doors are gone. You are forced into contemplation by this turn of events, and simply set on your padding in the middle of the room while you think. You should have know that the normal door would have finalized your decision, but there still should have been some kind of warning on the door to indicate such a drastic outcome!

Taking a deep breath, you calm your mind. You can’t get yourself out of this situation now, so what are you going to do about it? Looking around the room you begin to remember what drove you to become this young in the first place A nice soft cushy crib assures you a restful night's sleep. Dotted around the room are heaps of colorful baby toys sure to bring endless entertainment. A quick glance at the changing table and diaper stacks remind you of the ironic freedom of dependency babies and toddlers take for granted. Crawling was far easier than trying to balance on two legs all day, and such coordination wouldn't even be necessary thanks to loving parents willing to cater to your every whim. This is what you wanted, after all.

As you sit deep in thought, a pressure begins to build in your bowels. It is barely noticeable at first, but quickly makes itself known to you. Instinctively, you get back on your hands and knees and quickly attempt to crawl out of your room and into the nearest bathroom. You don’t get far before your body decides otherwise. Still on your hands and knees, you begin unwillingly pushing the mess into your readily awaiting diaper. Waves of pleasurable release from your infant mind distract your adult mind from properly registering the taboo your small baby body is now committing. You can feel your diaper begin to grow heavier as your bowels empty themselves of their contents. You had been concerned about the act of using your diaper before, but the act itself didn’t actually feel bad at all.

After recovering from your sudden bowel movement, you decide to inspect the damage you brought about on your infantile garment. You begin crawling towards the mirror you had previously used to inspect yourself through the various stages of regression. Progress slowed due to the recent addition of the load in your diaper, but you eventually reach your destination. Turning your body sideways you get a clear view of the large lumps protruding from your once clean diaper and begin to giggle profusely. Something about the naughtiness of your actions is so pleasing to your infant and adult mind. You just did something you never could have gotten away with as an adult, but in this state, nobody would think any less of your heavily infantile actions. A nearly toothless smile spread across your face as you realized how truly dependent you had become, and you loved it!

You typically wore a bit of makeup, just enough to accentuate your own natural beauty. However for some reason as you set to work you found you were using a little more than before. The base you had gone for you were piling on all over quite thickly. While you typically went for something that gave your own skin a slight hint of tan you absent mindidly noticed here you were picking something quite light. It was in fact snow white but you paid it no mind.
Then came the lipstick. Unlike your usual muted shade you hear picked a bright colour and went to town, puckering up and going over your lips a fair few times. You then ntoiced you had done a little wide so instead of simply wiping off and trying again you decided to purposefully go around your lips to hide the mistake. Then you went around that and then that.
Your cheeks you realised once done were far to vibrant so you decided to work with them and turn them into cute hearts that contrasted your nose nicely.
This carried on until a clown looked back out of the mirror at you. Your hair, after being brushed had gone into a completely frizzy state that made it look like it had trippled in size and so you figured the best was to "hide" this, rather than do anything about it seen as something like that had never happened before, was to place a hairband on your head that had a cute little jester hat attached to the top in the hopes that this would draw the eye.
You sat there and looked at yourself and.....................................
152221.title: Tidy yourself up

1523.content:
"You can talk!?" you gasp.

"Yes, we've covered this already. This house is magic, this room is magic, therefore, I the Rubber Duck, can talk. Now...if you want to have some fun..."

"Oh, right, sorry...what were you going to say?" you ask.

"I was going to say I suggest you look at the mirror behind you." The duck says with a grin. You do as you are told and you see an ornate mirror, body length, with a golden glittering frame.

"Now...speak to the mirror...say "Magic Mirror on the Wall..." the duck says

"Magic Mirror on the wall" you repeat and you watch as the edges of the mirror start to glow....causing your eyes to widen in shock...it was Magic!

"Make me the Cutest Clown of All" said the duck...which you repeated...

Then the mirror formed a face, and gasped "As you wish...."

Soon your reflection swirled, and the mirror's face appeared again..

"Please...state a color"

15231.content:
"Uh, green?" you say.

"As you wish," the mirror's face says before is disappears and your reflection reappears. As you watch, your reflection's hair glows slightly before suddenly growing and extending out into an afro, and then changing color into a bright neon green.

"Wow, cool trick," you say with laugh.

"Wait for it," the Rubber Duck says with a sinister chuckle.

"Huh?" you ask, before feeling a tingling in your scalp. As it spreads, you're surprised to see the edges of your vision filled with bright green. In shock, you reach up and tug a bit at your hair, and are shocked to see it now matches your reflection.

"WHAT THE FUCK?!" you scream.

"You asked the mirror to make you a cute clown, and now it will," the Rubber Duck laughs.

"Now then," the mirror's voice speaks up again, "For the next step, let's...
15231.title: Green

"What?" you ask in shock, before your reflection's ears start glowing slightly. They then stretch out, growing to a ridiculous size, pushing aside the hair in the way as they do so, until they're almost a foot long each.

You whimper slightly as you feel your own ears start to stretch, and reach up to feel them, confirming that they're now as big as in your reflection.

"Ah, the Dumbo approach, I like it," the Rubber Duck says with a cruel laugh.

"Stop it!" you beg.

"But we've only just started," the mirror replies, "And you'll never be a cute clown if we give up. Now then, now that you have those lovely big ears, let's give you a matching...
152312.title: ...give you big ears."

15232.content:
"uh...Red" you say

"Excellent, let's get started, shall we!" said the raspy voice of the mirror as your reflection smiled back at you, which you found odd, since you weren't smiling, more or less still in shock over the talking mirror and duck.

You watch the reflection and you watch as the mirror-you reaches up and takes out the hair tie holding up it's hair, and to your astonishment, the hair tie in your hair falls out at the same time. Your neck length hair now at it's full length, the mirror shakes it's head, and the hair in the reflection begins to grow!

The hair begins to shimmer as it stretches out. The reflection turns around showing you that the hair has grown to the shoulders, then the back, then the small of the back, and then the ass, before stopping. And that's where you felt it. A strong tingle and slight pulling sensation in the base of your skull as your own hair begins to stretch and grow just like the reflections.

"All you can say is "Oh My God" as you feel it reach your back. You had always wanted longer hair, but this was unreal.

Once it reached your ass, it stopped, and the girl in the reflection smiled and ran her fingers through her hair, and you watched as from the roots emmerged a new color...bright fire-engine red, like a cartoon character might sport, and in seconds the color reached the end, and then you could see your hair starting the same transformation. Turning Red, like you had said.

Once your hair color was officially red, the mirror laughed.

"And one last touch!" it said as the reflection's hair magically twisted itself into two long ponytails, causing yours to do the same.

"Oh, Wow!" you gasp. You had clown hair, and you sort of liked it. One could only wonder what the mirror had in store for you.

The white then began to spread over the face, down the neck, and...all across the body. You then feel a tingle on the tip of your own nose, and look down to see the white rapidly spreading. "Neat, huh? Permawhite. Good Stuff" the mirror laughed.

"Yeah. I guess." You say, still feeling quite...odd about this whole things.

You look at the reflection and watch as blue spreads from the eyelid all the way up to the brow on each eye, and speaking of the brow...you gasp as they vanish and are replaced by drawn on ones, curling up in a very cute manor.

"Now then...how about we get you a nice...

my name is

She instantly freaks out and falls on her big bloomers! But once she hits the ground, the reflection goes back to normal. She feels her face, no duckbill, just her piercings! She feels her head, no big dumb looking bonnet, just her long dark braided hair!

She takes a deep breath and then after a while she giggles again, she feels really silly! She tries to get back up and approach the mirror, but she stumbles, she forgot to check her feet. Instead of her sneakers she had plastic looking bright orange webbed duck feet, and so, she freaked out again! She smooths a devious face, wraps her arms around you as best as she can and gives you a big kiss! She fits it on and it quickly takes its magical hold! She could breath through it and when she turned to note you on it, she quacked! She looked at the mirror pleasantly surprised and quacked again! She quacks away as you put her ID sticker on, 'Quackie Treats' was her new name! She notices and happily quacks on in celebration, small frilly pink parasol the mirror reflected into the palm of her hands made it even better for a final touch!

15232222211211221111.title: "Let's go out and see if there are any ...

152322222112112211112.content:
And what fun they were having! All manner of rowdy, inappropriate fun! There was loud music, and drinking, and smoking, and nobody had any makeup on! The girls were the worse, not only did they bare it all in those unflattering bikinis, but none of them had their noses on! Not even rosy round cheeks or freckles or blush! No pigtails, no ruffle collars, no gloves, nothing! The bigger tragedy is you actually can't blame these strays looking at the male specimens playing such horrible influence on them, all full of pride and luxury with their selfishly well-built bodies and tribal tattoos! Not a single one of their fancy-schmancy swimming trunks had a patch stitched on for a little sign of hobo humility! Let's not get into the music scrambling their minds like eggs, b/c it's all too obvious: heinous dubstep! Clowns this age should be listening to some good old fashioned calliope! They should appreciate it, understand it, train their antics and tricks laboriously to it as they prepare to receive the torch and become the bozos of a new generation!

You can feel it in your big happy bouncy heart and you know all too well what it means: you have a mission now, and you must make this right! These clowns have been spectators far too long, it's time now for their curtain call! You must discipline them back to a life of selfless comical entertainment! Back to their babydoll dresses, back to their comedy coats & pants, back to their colorful jumpsuits, and even diapers if that's what they must wear for the act! "What the Heck?..." - you then hear behind you! Both you and Quackie bolt up in proper toon reaction, covering your mouths agasped (in her case, bill), and dramatically turn around to see a young white male with short braided dark hair all ready in a bathing suit and towel standing by the doorframe of the Clown Room, just looking at you in curious disgust. Panicking, you bellyflop him into the Room, but suddenly before you move in to properly transform him inside, Quackie pushes you aside!
"Out of the way!" - she says, not quack, somehow she took off her bill! Recognizing her despite the bleached face, he calls out her name, and she responds by shoving him down the bed, which magically puffs into a giant nest with bright plastic hay restraining his arms and legs! Quackie then stands in front of the mirror, she curtsies, closes her eyes in deep concentration, and puckers her lips! She returns to her struggling subject with makeup neatly in place but still on her dress and bonnet. "Hey babe..." - she says as she sensually lays down on his restrained body!
"M-Michelle, what the Hell!? This is just trippy, something wrong with you, something wrong with this place! What's going on!?"
"I got clowned babe, I got clowned hard, heh heh..." - she bats her lashes comically and plays with the bow keeping her bonnet in place! "...and guess what, sexy? You're next..." - and they kiss! He squirms and struggles at first, but in the end submits and his lips lock to hers! The hay next springs to life! Wrapping both of them as they kiss, by the time the guy notices to only panic it's already too late and the cocooned metamorphosis begins! In a haze he hears nothing but a melody of ducks happily quacking along, when his vision clears up he sees the rubber ducky from a distant blueness, it increases in sizes until it's gigantic enough to swallow him! The blueness and the melody continues and he's somehow floating! Some white cartoon gloves materialize themselves and strip him off his trunks! More of these gloves appear, one of them had a cartoon electric razor shaving him bald, followed by a large paintbrush and a tin of yellow paint that plastered all over his naked body! Large comical white underwear with red hearts pattern came next, and before dressing him in his new baby blue sailor outfit, they made sure he got a good look at it! This was going to be a vital look for his new life! As soon as he receives his silly little sailor hat his head feels warm, and he watches his new corkscrew blonde curls grow! The cartoon gloves then hold him up and push him down to his new duck fins! And as soon as they snap on and take hold, the nest opens up! He bumbles his way down and around the room on his new paddled webbed feet until Quackie gets a grip on him and they face each other! She inspects the changes on him and smiles. "David, ole buddy, ole pal, I got a very important thing to ask ya now that we're both clowns!..." - she puts her beak back on. "I'll be the mommy, and you'll be my sweet, goofy little gossling!" - and she jams on him his new duckbill! "Quack quack quackitty quack, hah ha!" - she prides herself with her new partner standing in front of the mirror!
152322222112112211112.title: And what fun they were having!

She did not however seemed mad at her, instead she was bust readying up a garment she was about to present to her privileged wayward daughter on a blank mannequin prepped in the middle of the room. "Oh, 3am Brianna! My does time fly when you kids today normally sneak out at what should be considered returning hours!"

"Brianna!" - the Payasita calls and snaps her out of the panic for a second, Brianna squints recognizing her in the new outfit.

"Oh God no, but they won't get me!..." - she then attempts to stand up, her stomach sinking hearing the squeaks on the pumps her mother forced on her once they hit the floor, she only then continues to register herself in shock fully suited with her arms wide open. "Okay, okay I dunno what we can do but, just calm down for a second. Take a deep breath or something, and uh...just look at me..."
"Right, right..." - Brianna follows these instructions and her panic indeed subsides. "Margie, you...you've always been such a great friend..." - she begins to say in a worried tone. "...and you know...you actually look kinda cute."
