Next she took out some bright red lipstick and put it on, after that she closed her eyes, stretched out both her arms into the air and sweetly puckered her lips for a kiss!

She was finally in position and you can barely contain your excitement as you emerge from under the bed! You manage to stop first though, then you look at her still human hair and the rubber ducky. You shake the ducky up real hard and then squeeze it over her head, you had converted Quackie's braids into her new bright yellow hair! It shimmered like pom poms and it stretched all the way down to her back!

Okay, she's all ready now! You give her the kiss of her life! It's as if she didn't know what a real kiss was until she was kissed by a clown like you! This is your biggest and goofiest smooch yet, you giggle as your big nose meets hers and it honks! You both laugh now as you keep rubbing it in a fun fit of Eskimo kissing until suddenly, her suit explodes and you roll to the floor!

In a haze of confusion you look up, her suit had inflated the same as yours! She's looking, feeling herself, panting and in shock! She then closes her eyes and takes a deep breath, she composes herself and turns to the mirror. "Nose, please..." - she says.
"Just honk!" - replied the mirror, she did so and a big red clown nose also the same as Jolly Treats burst out!
"Oh Sweetie, it's so nice to have you with us on our side!" - the mirror began to talk. "Now, why don't you be a good little clown and tell me how many of those guys you were with are coming??"
"Don't know, right now I feel kinda...funny! I'll need some time...and some new shoes!"
"Naturally!" - and in the new clowns hands appeared her new big yellow Mary Janes! She smiled and wobbled to the bed for a place to sit and put them on! You walk up to her with your jaw dropped, you are speechless! You sit next to her on the bed without taking your eyes off her and you smile at how silly she looks putting those shoes on with those inflated arms, just like you did earlier, what a beautiful clown she had become! She then puts her name tag on, her new name is Sweetie Biggie! "Oh hi!" - you feel the need to introduce yourself after reading that. "I'm Jolly Treats, pleased to meet you!"
"Hi Jolly! I'm Sweetie, Sweetie Biggie!"
"Say Sweetie, how come you came through the window??"
"I did?? Wow, that's strange. I don't remember doing something like that!" - she then put her hand on her forehead, she then looked at her gloved hand. "Wait a minute..." - she looked at her inflated body and started feeling on it again. "What is this?! What's going on!? What's happening to me!?"
"Oh no! Look at your nose!" - you tell her and reach for it making it honk.
She gasps! "Cooool!" - she celebrates and gives it a few pokes getting a few more honks! "I-I...what happened to me? When did my nose get like this? I mean, I always wanted a big red nose like a clown but-" - you're then both startled by Quakie rushing into the room quacking madly!

You're quick to react after what you just heard!
15232222211211221112221.title: Pallette swap!

choices: You're gonna teach the new clown how to kiss!
You give her a big baby bottle!
152322222112112211122211.content:
"Wait, no...no!" - Sweetie Biggie suddenly snapped again out of her new clown self. She then madly tugged at anything she could reach in place that had transformed her, the hair, the inflated suit, the gloves. "Ugh, why won't this come off?!" - she'd say in a very angry tone as she did all this.
"Darling, darling, please!" - the mirror spoke again. "You're not doing yourself any favors now! You already know it's not gonna come off! Here, just park your shiny new bubble butt in front of me and instead of looking so stupid trying to take everything off, study it! Take everything in, and you'll be the clown you've always dreamed to be!"
"Oh, o-okay...n-no! This, this isn't real! I'm not really a clown!" - she then wobbled over to the window and prepared to lunge out, she had used her awesome parkour skills to enter, but in this new outfit and shoes, and an evolving clown state of mind, she had no idea what to do other than take a deep breath, hold her nose as if she was going to land in a tub for a circus act, and dove down balloon butt first!
"Oh my shit, Sweetie!" - you squeak.
"Heheheheh, oh you girls were born for this..." - said the mirror, and as you peered through the window to see what happened to her... "She's fine! See?" - the mirror kept explaining, and you found her getting back on her feet smiling and shaking everything off. "You really make an adorable pair of clowns! Oh I just can't wait to take you all out and pimp you to the circuses! We'll have to get her head in the right place though..."
Sweetie then looked around and when she saw exactly where she landed a goofy over acted face of panic drew on her face! A woman broke her fall!

A large, tattooed woman!

She wore a gym tank top the exact same color as the sleek outfit Sweetie was wearing earlier and long camo combat pants with boots. She was unconscious and Sweetie dropped down to hold her. "Oh no! Vicky! Vicky, Silly Big Vicky, are you okay!?" - she'd say, she knew who she was. Then before her eyes Quackie softly landed down with her tiny umbrella, and smacked her real hard in the face with a cream pie! She fell on her back and before she knew it Quackie bounced Vicky off her inflated clown chest, sending it flying to you, giggling as you catch it and receive a new clown! Before Quackie bounced back, she placed a shrink wrapped pack of colorful balloons and some string on one of Sweetie's hand. After she was gone Sweetie struggled back to her feet wiping off the cream on her face and then looked up, you and Quackie were looking back at her giggling until diving back inside to keep playing!

"You guys are such meanies!" - Sweetie began to protest. "I am so gonna tell on you when I get back!" - she then examined the pack of balloons in her hand, she opened it and started to inflate them. When she had enough, she magically floated back up to the room and walked in, without letting them go.

Vicky lay on the bed and you and Quackie looked on acting worried. "Dude, she hasn't woken up yet!" - you say to her.
"Oh no! How could I do something like this!?" - she replied as she wobbled and dipped to her side.
"You were being selfish!" - said the mirror.
"She's right, you know..." - you add. "You also made us feel so worried!"
"Quack quack quack quack!" - Quackie quacked. No, really!
"Oh! No, why? I'm...I'm such a bad...such a bad...clown!" - Sweetie lamented, she turned and looked at herself in the mirror, balloons still in hand mind you. "I'm the worse clown in the world!" - she continued as she turned back to Vicky.
"Now now, Sweetie..." - the mirror would talk again. "That's not really true, you're actually a very special clown. Why, you being the sweetest clown in the world makes you as big and plump as your best friend!"
"R-really?"
"Heck yeah!" - you snap smiling at her. "You just made a mistake, that's all!"
"Quack! Quack quack quack!" - quacked also Quacky gently at her.

She looks at them, confused. She has another bout of feeling herself and looking at her reflection in the mirror, she then turned to Vicky and reacted surprised again. She then paused and thought for a moment, until she smiled. She dove her head gently down at Vicky and hid her giggles. "Told you those decals had to go, stupid!" - she whispered into her ear. She then turned back to you and Quackie. "Okay, you guys win- I mean...you guys are so cool! I can't believe I put you through all that! From now on, I promise I'll be a good clown!" - a rush of relief flooded her mind making her swoon at the mirror. "And thanks for the new name!" - she said to it.
"You're gonna love working for me!" - it replied.

"Quack quack quack?"
"Right, what about her?" - Sweetie asked pointing at a still unconscious Vicky.

"Oh we'll fix that right up!" - you tell them. "Here..."
152322222112112211122211.title: BUT NOT OUT THE WINDOW

choices: "Let's wait and see what other fun person shows up!"
1523222221121122111222112.content:
Vicky woke up to the sight of three clowns watching over her. A big pink and yellow one held her lying back and was feeding her milk from a big baby bottle.

"Ooooh, she woke up!" - you said, holding Sweetie's balloons while she worked on her friend.
"Quack quack!" - quacked Quackie.
"Okay that's it Vicky, good girl! Now drink it all up and the fun begins!" - said Sweetie, to which Vicky responded with pushing her away and sitting up coughing and wiping her mouth. "* cough* *cough* What the fucking fuck is going on here?! What the Hell do you clowns think you're doing?!"
"Well, you, were in an accident!" - claimed Sweetie, outraged at that reaction.
"Huh, that's gratitude for ya!" - you add, looking on surprised. Vicky then looked at Sweetie confused, trying to recognize who was buried under all that what she thought was makeup after hearing her voice. "...Robin?!"
"...Batman??" - she giggled.
"Oh my God it is you! What's gotten into you?! Why are you dressed like that!? You're in the middle of a mission and you decide to literally clown around?!"
"Indeed I am on a mission, you meathead you, and clowning it up is the only way I can complete it! Now open wide, you can act like a big baby after we turn you into one!" - and she attempted to push the bottle back into her mouth, only to get it shoved aside rather forcefully and standing up with authority, Vicky was furious now! "You put that in my mouth again and I swear I will break every bone in your body! You know I can do it, and you know that you're in serious deep shit as of today! I hope you feel comfortable on those big clown shoes because they'll now your only source of income, bozo!"
"Really??"
"Yes, really!"

And then Vicky pissed herself.

She simply stood there, wide eyed and paralyzed as it happened. The three clowns watching, devious grins drawing on their faces. "Quackie, please." - you instruct, and then she unfolded once again the dressing panel used on her earlier, she stayed on the outside looking for Vicky's new clothes while you tied up the balloons on one of the panels and Sweetie began to strip her. She giggles. "Just look at you, you've always been such a huge clown without any of the frills!" - she said.
"Quack quack, quack quack quack!" - Quackie went as she walked back in.
"That's right, today all that changes!" - you gingerly add.

With a simple poke Sweetie knocks back to the bed the musclebound woman, you immediately put her on a thick diaper held together by a large toy looking pin. "More milk for Baby!" - Sweetie declared and jams the bottle in her mouth. Vicky helplessly drinks and the magic takes immediate effect, she watched in horror how her skin bleached knowing she was about to become just like them, her tribal and prison tattoos all began to twist and turn and change into images of smiling Disney Princesses posing, her dark long hair with red highlights took life of its own but started to shake into the same bright yellow pom pom straws as Sweetie. The bottle gets pulled out so they can marvel at this stage of her transformation.
"Awwww, she looks so adorable!" - you quip. Sweetie gently smiles at her and giggles. "Baby this is the truth, going bozo will make you feel like a real woman!" - and with that they grabbed her by the hand and pulled her on her feet again. Quackie came in with her new baggy jammies, pink with yellow polka dots also like Sweetie, and they hid all her muscles in this garment. Soft white mittens popped out when her hands reached the sleeves locking them tight, as did some soft white socks on her feet. Her name tag was her large white frilly bib, in yellow sewn cartoon letters 'Baby Biggie', Sweetie was the one to tie this and with a big surprised smile on her face she pecked the big clown baby a kiss on her cheeks, her face still wide eyed in shock. You had the honor of tying her big matching bonnet while Quackie removed the panel revealing to Baby what she had become to the mirror. The other smiling clowns just stood by as she slowly approached it to take a closer look. The mirror giggled. "No, you're not dreaming! This is what you get to be, and isn't it just great?? You get to be a baby! A big and funny clown baby!"
"G-g-goo goo?! Daba!? Dada!?" - Baby asked.
"Oh but of course my dear!" - said the mirror and a giant pink plastic pacifier popped in the air around her out of nowhere, it flew into her mouth and she smiled! She pranced back to the other clowns giggling and they celebrate! She grabs Quackie and gives her a hug bear hug assuming she's a stuffed animal, but as we all know she's not and she's in complete pain! She sits on the bed again cradling her while you put on her a pair of pink sneakers.
"Sweetie..." - the mirror calls out, the clown has her balloons again and silently replies just looking. "Time to brush up on your clown magic! Help your baby sister out making your hand quicker than your wrist!"

Sweetie gets this and she makes a medium sized red clown nose appear in her hands, she smiles and prances to Baby to finally transform her nose! And there was much rejoicing!
"Who else is here?" - you whisper into Sweetie's ear in the middle of the celebration.
"A few more, should we bring more of them into the fold or should we just let them find us?"
1523222221121122111222112.title: From abs to AB!

choices: The mirror sics the clowns after them!
The mirror hatched a devious trap!
15232222211211221112221122.content:
Being a baby clown just so happened to be a perfect fit for this new bozo! She had developed such a big body through years of weigh lifting, she could now use that to give big lovable hugs to anything! Quackie was still on the receiving end of one, but instead of love she felt nothing but bone crushing pain as the other bubbly clowns stood by smiling and scheming with the mirror! And without any of them noticing, she squeezed herself out of the hold and ran out of the room as soon as Baby tried to grab hold of her again!

The long hallway became the comical scene of a circus act as one happy big baby clown chased a panicking little lady duck! Quackie makes a few turns trying to escape her sight, when she finally manages to she enters a well lit colorful room full of toys, she locks the door but begins to pace rapidly like a cartoon character! What was she gonna do?? Baby will be on her real quick and when she found her, she was gonna become the first duck pretzel!

Suddenly, the windows opened and Quackie saw another woman dressed just like Sweetie before she was a clown enter the room! Quackie then had an idea, she grabbed an inflated mace toy and whacked the woman on the head! She then stripped her and then herself, she was gonna trade places! Something weird happened when she fitted her with her baby doll dress though, she had bleached and lost all her hair as soon as the head was in place! When she worked the legs through the bloomers, the webbed feet came out! She checked her own feet, and they while they were still bleached, they were back to normal! She then tied up the bonnet, and as soon as she took off the beak to out it on her face, her dark braids cascaded back down! She was almost back to normal, but as Baby started knocking a few doors down, she went back to transforming this new woman into a duck and then hid under a pile of plush toys wearing her blue suit!

The knockings kept going and they were getting closer, slowly waking the newly minted lady duck up. She opens her eyes, feels her new duckbill, her new dress, and her new bonnet...and she bolts to her new webbed feet realizing something was amiss! She's shocked beyond belief looking at the ridiculous transformation she had gone through and started quaking in her panic! Baby finally knocks on the door as the duck spots a mirror and beholds her new look, giving out a huge quack! Baby breaks through the door as if it were foam and happily whisks away the befuddled duck to her new life with a huge backbreaking hug!

Victorious, the girl comes out of her hiding place. She then tries to see her way out and goes through the long hallway. She stops when she notices something had changed, specifically the walls, they were now the same as The Clown Room's. Framed portraits were also in place with various pictures of women. She recognized a picture of Sweetie, again as a normal woman, and approached it to examine. As she did, it changed into the big adorable clown she had helped transform! Balloons and all! She then spots a picture of Vicky, it too changed into the big Baby she had now become! The same thing happened with the picture of the new girl who had taken over her duties as Quackie, and on the edge of the staircase was a picture of you! Transforming quickly into Jolly Treats! The girl stood there before walking down, but suddenly retreated when she noticed something on the floor below! Three women, two of them wearing the blue skin tight suit packing sub-machine guns and the third on a dark business blazer, all of them with a scary look on their faces! The girl retreated back to the hallway as far as she could, she found her way to the toy room again and tried to think of a way to evacuate. The rope New Quackie had used to walk in was still in place, that was her chance!

But then, she stopped...

She thought about the clowns, she thought about all the fun she had and the surreal experience that was transforming into one and doing the same to other chicks. She thought about the guns and how dangerous those people looked...those guys didn't deserve that! They're just clowns!

She backed away from the window and went out the hallways again. She met her portrait, she looked normal even though her actual skin at the time was bleached. She looked at it intently for a moment, and then it changed. A large green ruffle covered her neck and her braids turned green, shaping themselves into long corkscrew curls! She started to smile, but rather than sit and see how it happened, her transformation continued as she ran to warn the others! Her suit started to inflate and her steps started to sound like squeaks! She then adjusted the pace for her new big floppy green clown shoes to make sure that she did not tripe and that she looked as funny as possible! She finally reaches The Clown Room again, but before going in she makes sure to complete her new look! Out of nowhere she pulls out her new big red nose and smilingly fits it in, she takes a few breaths to make it adjust and make sure it's in place properly and that it honked right! Next came a cute little light purple bow she settled on top of her new clown hair! And finally, her new name tag. "Awesome!" - she celebrated reading it and wore it with her new found clown pride: Mini Mimi!

She opens the door. "Oh, don't worry Baby!" - she sees you and Sweetie comforting the baby bozo, New Quackie had the lower hald of her body sunk on a huge nest, struggling to get out as it dragged itself into the mirror and it disappeared! "That duck just needs a re-education! She'll be back real soon and as sweet as ever, I promise!" - after the blur of that magic, Mini is able to see she had become as inflated as Sweetie and Jolly, her suit was light purple with green polka dots.

"Hi! What's your name??" - asked Sweetie.
"Oh uh, hello! Look, you don't know me but I know you and I saw these meanies back there, they had guns! I think they wanna hurt you guys!" - Mini answered, the other clowns gasped!
"Gee whiz! And how many meanies did you see??" - you asked.
"Three, two goons and one bossy lady!"
"Piece of cake!" - said the mirror!
15232222211211221112221122.title: Quackie on scouting!

choices: Meanwhile, you had prepared the room for a huge party!
Quackie is to also wheel them all into the mirror!
152322222112112211122211221.content:
The door to The Clown Room slowly opens and a smiling Quackie pokes her head out looking around the hallway. The coast is clear, so she merrily skips outside with a closed down small pink plastic looking toy baby carriage. She prances all the way back to the toy room and leaves it at the center. She knocks on it twice and waits, while she does that she spots the mirror from last time again and approaches it to inspect herself for a moment. She studies her figure curtsying and making a mockery out of sexy poses in her new attire clearly not meant for them. She quacks in laughter for a moment, but then sighs in small strange frustration still looking at what she had become.

"Oh my God, get me out of here! Somebody help, get me out of here!" - Robin's voice is heard from the carriage, and that was Quackie's cue, she dropped to the floor pretending to be another toy and was undetected by the three remaining intruders entering the scene immediately after hearing the cries for help.
"Robin?! Is that you?!" - asked the one wearing the dark blazer.
"Yes, Mariana! Oh God yes! I need help, I have no idea where I am right now!"
The gun-toting fems giggle, they could clearly hear her cries coming from the baby carriage. They assumed it was just another elaborate trick of the famed Lord Hugo!
"Jesus Christ Robin, you're telling me you're gonna fall for such a cheap trick like a rookie..." - said a brunette of the two approaching the carriage and opening it up.

An unreal blast of water smacks the three women sending them to different corners of the room! They next hear a voice they recognized doing an over the top performance of a baby crying, and in the haze of recovery they see from that small carriage emerge a huge clown baby pumping water like a fire hydrant in her eyes! Quackie surprises them next by walking up to her and shutting her up putting a large pacifier in her mouth! And then the giggles began and Sweetie teamed up with Mini suddenly emerged from the carriage! They make their big entrance chasing each other circling the carriage, then comically started flopping each others inflated bellies 3 times, they then held hands facing each other and rubbed their huge clown noses. Next came the big finale, and the 2 goons stood helpless with their guns soaked and useless as the goofballs rushed in and flopped their bellies at them! Sweetie took on the brunette, pinning her against the wall and knocking her face first to the floor! The woman had a shocked look on her face as this happened, and then Sweetie quickly stops her from getting back on her feet by sitting on her back and smacking her face with a cream pie! The girl Mini took on met a similar fate, and then both clowns went about to pulling colorful handkerchiefs from their mouths and used them to tie their victims up! Mariana stood there with her mouth opened completely stunned, which enabled Baby to easily shove a big baby bottle in and pick her up!

The clowns marched back into the carriage with their prizes and Quackie pranced back to The Clown Room wheeling them in!
152322222112112211122211221.title: Clown Force are a go!

choices: Pin the tail on the new friend!
1523222221121122111222112211.content:
It's party time at The Clown Room and Quackie wheels in the entertainment! Her arrival is met with applause and giddy cheers from two young women sitting on colorful plastic chairs wearing party hats and eating cake. Quackie opens the carriage and jumps into her nest, reaching for two large knitting needles and starts to work as everyone waits for those super silly clowns to pop up and start the show! Mini and her mummified captive are the first one to come out, she giggles as she sees the redecoration and preps up her captive on one of the chairs. Behind her she hears the two young women she hadn't noticed jump out of their chairs and run at her screaming in excitement: "Oh my God it's her!"
"She's a clown, she's a clown!"

Mini turns to see, but the smile on her face gets wiped with befuddlement as soon as she confronts them, they were dressed in a similar fashion as her before becoming either a duck or the big clown she was now. She then recognized them. "S-Sam? Eva?" - she asks, and her mind starts racing as she notices her big red nose first and then her complete transformation, feeling herself in a panic not very different from how Sweetie behaved earlier. "W-w-what's going on?! What the Hell is this?! Why am I dressed like a clown?!"
"Tee hee hee, that's because you are a clown..." - said Eva searching her tag. "...Mini!"
"And that is an understatement! You're like, a super clown! I gotta admit, they did this so right, you look...hot!" - said Sam sizing her up with a very pleased look on her face.
"W-w-wait guys, no! I mean, I don't, I, I, I just!..." - Mini says panicking. "What happened to me?!"
"Aw, you poor thing!" - Sam says wrapping her arms around her neck hugging and bringing her smirking face to hers. "Well, you're not supposed to be in on anything on your old life but, let me you just reassure you that this is all for the best!" - she softly kisses her nose and both her cheeks!
"It was either this or baby jail, and neither of us wanted any of that..." - said Eve reaching for a pair of garments Quackie had just finished working on. "But since you're always so stubborn, we had to sneak this one up on you!"
"So don't you worry that stupid little bozo head of yours, baby! We'll join you! The three of us are gonna stop being meanie creepy juvenile delinquents!..."
"And be for the next 20 years adorable jumbo sized circus clowns! Our parents had a very awesome agreement with a few circuses running this new program and from here on out, they'll get paid for every performance we're in! All over the world!"
"What?! No!"
"Man what is it about you creatures that turns me on so much? I mean it doesn't even matter if it's a lady in a clown suit like you, big sexy..." - Sam says, and she gives her lips a huge kiss! It's prolonged, and it takes a minute for Mini's face to change from shock to swooning and joining on the act! She wraps her arms around her and moves her body to the bed, she sits her up before the kiss ends and they both look at each other giggling. "Oh ho ho! Hey there, naughty girl!" - Mini says, tranced back into her clown self. "So...you really like clowns??"
"You bet! Got any fun tricks to show me, bubble butt??"
"Hm hm hm, bubble butt she says!" - and once again Mini starts pulling out colorful tied hankies from her mouth, bit by bit this time however, as she first tied Sam's hands and then her feet in a kinky style! She then gagged her devious smile, put her over her shoulder, and walked towards Eve. "S'up, Evey??" - she greets her smiling, it was like restarting the reunion!
"Hey there tubby! Can I have some sugar too??" - and they both kiss giggling! "Okay, now come on! We got our parents and the circus waiting downstairs for us to change! We also have to give them a show before we hit the road!"
"I'll help you guys out!" - and the three of them walked into the mirror! Less than 2 minutes go by, and once again Mini is the first one to come out, she looks back at the mirror and wait with excitement! Sam's the next one to wobble out, she was bleached and inflated, with large floppy red shoes as she always wanted, a white balloon suit with multicolored polka dots plastered all over, large curly blue hair wearing a tiny hat with a flower sticking and comically waving out! Her name tag read 'Dotty'. Eve came next, but even though she was also bleached, her suit was not inflated and she didn't have a nose as big as her friends, but she was smiling either way in her new tight candy striped wear, her hair had turned pink and she had a pointy red hat on top. Her shoes were as red and as floppy as her friends, and she had a large white ruffle in her neck and her name tag read 'Miss Cotton'!

Transformed, Dotty and Miss Cotton regard themselves in the mirror with big smiles! "This, is, awesome!" - Dotty said.
"Simply amazing!" - said Cotton.
A happy Mini walked up to the door reflecting on the life that awaited her with her best friends win the whole wide world! 20 years under this spell, living in a circus, making people everywhere laugh! How could she ever deny it?? This was a calling, she was a clown! A big, wonderful clown!

And she had yet another surprise waiting for her as soon as she opened the door, her own mother was there! They stood there quiet for a few seconds, until she gave her clown daughter a kiss on her forehead and then held both her hands. "You look beautiful!" - she said.
"M-mom...Mommy...what's gonna happen to me now?" - Mini asks, in a slightly worried tone.
"Now, you and your friends are gonna have a place in life. When the time is up, you sign again, you'll be the same clown you are now..."
Mini could only stand speechless after she heard that. "Hurry up and go get your friends." - her mom let go. "I'll be with everyone else waiting downstairs, I can't wait to see your act!" - and she walked away. Mini slowly retreated back in shutting the door with a shocked look on her face. She then wobbled up to the mirror, her friends had assaulted the party cake and were now just quietly kissing each other. She looked at herself for a moment, and then closed her eyes and took a deep breath.

Her captive earlier regained consciousness, she only saw the door close and only heard a big goofy giggle. The Quackie was on her...
1523222221121122111222112211.title: Clowngirl Forever

1523222221121122111222112212.content:
Okay, we're all set! While the girls went out you decided to fix yourself up a little bit more and you had done the impossible and made yourself into an even bigger clown! You worked your lashes, making them into big oval arches and from one cheek to another you had painted a big shiny red silhouette of a smile! You've completed the look and were an absolute clown!

Quackie rolls in and you happily wobble up to her! You open the carriage and the first thing you see is Baby still holding on to Mariana and force feeding her a baby bottle! She still made an effort to fight this but it was already too late, her skin was already bleached! You climb inside, the magic of the carriage making some room under in that very space! "Hey Baby!" - you greet once inside. "Who's your friend??" - you ask, reaching for the bottle. You grab it and start drinking some milk for yourself as Quackie closes down! She then readied herself and the carriage up to the mirror and magically rolled into it!

Mariana wakes up, before finally passing out she was seeing nothing but clowns piling up all around her in a way that seemed very unreal inside that carriage and absolutely nothing to make it stop. She always felt this way about clowns, it was the one type of persons in the world she had no control over. And they scared her so much as a child! It was dark now, except for the floor, it seemed a shade of purple with golden drawings of moons and stars scattered all over. She then spotted something bright lying on the floor near her, she walked up to it and found the two agents who were with her last. They lay there unconscious, their skin had bleached and their suits and hair had changed. She couldn't tell which was which with their new clown looks, but the former brunette sported a white suit with little drawings of polka hearts all over, her hair had changed to red. It seemed like mop fabric and was made into big long pigtails. The other one, a former blond, was also wearing a white suit but with multicolored polka dots. Her hair was the same length, but it had changed to rainbow colored and a pointy dunce hat the same pattern as her suit was placed on it. Mariana inspected their faces trying to tell who they could be, until she noticed in their eyes that they were both dreaming, and a smile drew on their tranquil sleeping faces!

She stepped back feeling a little shocked and suddenly, a spotlight shone in from behind her and she sees at a distance Robin, the braided girl that would eventually become Mimi, and you...all back to normal! Next, a round of applause is heard, followed by a murmur of an unseen crowd cheerfully anticipating a sensational act! And that's when the trapeze appeared, all deep blue with the same golden moons and stars as the floor, Robin climbed to it and a drum roll started! She reached for some lipstick and did her lips, she then struck a sexy pose and blew a kiss to the unseen spectators and with that, her figure burst again into the huge clown that is Sweetie Biggie! She comically falls off from the trapeze on her bottom and she sat up giggling waving to the spectators seemingly all around her laughing in histerics! She then got on her feet and stood next to the trapeze as the punk with the braids climbed up, suddenly a phone rang very loudly, and Sweetie out of nowhere pulled out a big pink plastic looking phone! She answers it and hands it over to the punk. "It's for you!" - she said and the second she had put it on her ear, she too ballooned into her clown form again! Adding to the hilarity of this act was the fact that she didn't react to the sudden transformation at all and still stood there on the phone listening! "Yes mom, I'm a clown now...yeah you can finally throw all that metalcore crap in my room out...yeah, that too, get me a van! We'll work on the rest when I'm done here. Yeah, love you too..."- she then hung up and bounced off the trapeze, belly flopping in celebration with Sweetie as you finally make your way up for your turn! The crowd hushes from their laughter as they anticipate your transformation into Treats, you close your eyes and you wait! Some time passes but...nothing happens! You look around in dismay, disappointed. "Aww, people, I think she needs some help!" - Mini then said.
"Hey girl..." - Sweetie called to you and you looked at her. "Don't you wanna be a clown??"
"...y-yes! Yes I do!" - you pout, though something at the back of your mind starts nagging you about that answer. Then, up on the distance some light bulbs come together forming the shape of a bright star!
"Then just wish for it!" - Sweetie said pointing at it. You smile with excitement and you close your eyes again with renewed anticipation! You concentrate, you try to get the feel and you finally make your wish!

"I wish I were a clown! I wish I were the biggest, funniest, goofiest, and dopiest clown in the world! I don't wanna worry about anything anymore! I don't wanna worry about college anymore! I don't wanna worry about guys anymore! I don't even wanna worry about being pretty anymore, I just wanna be a clown! I just wanna be a clown! I wish I were a clown! I wish I were a...wait, just what the fuck am I doing!?" - and you hear nothing but the biggest round of applause and laughter you ever heard in your life as you open your eyes again and find yourself standing on the top of a trapeze transformed into a clown! Two huge neatly wrapped boxes of gifts stand below you, and as you freak out feeling all the changes in your new body feeling assaulted by the noise, you trip backwards into your own box!

The spotlights all fade and Mariana faces nothing but darkness again, gasping in terror at what she just saw! She then hears goofy giggles behind her and turns around to see her agents back on their feet again with their new big floppy red shoes! They were both now walking up to her inflated with grins so big, their new clown noses couldn't hide them!
"Wait wait, girls! Snap out of it!" - she screamed walking away from them horrified, she too trips backwards and lands in a barber's seat! Her arms and legs get restrained by metal cuffs and it turns to a brightly lit makeup mirror where she finally sees to her horror how her skin had already bleached! The hearts clown wrapped a sheet around her to prepare her for a haircut, then the other one came with the electric razor, a clean and smooth shave then followed after clearing out all her hair. The clowns kiss her goodbye and walk into the darkness when finished leaving Mariana completely bald.

The restraints come off and she staggers on her steps, another spotlight comes on right in front of her. She felt drained from all the surprises but faced this new one, it was a small wrapped gift. She approached it and read a small note taped to it, it read:

To: Commander Mariana Swinton
From: Your favorite clowns!
"You've always been very special to us! You'll make an exceptional clown!"

She opens the gift and stands wide-eyed...
1523222221121122111222112212.title: Quackie is to also wheel them all into the mirror!

15232222211211221112221122121.content:
Dawn, as the sun gently breaks the morning in through the window, the laughs begin as it reveals the clowns in their bedroom. The bed itself is empty though it looks like it had just been used, an inflated rainbow colored clown sleeps on the floor at the foot of it sitting on her balloon butt smiling down snoring. Her face is full of red lip marks and right next to her we see another bubbly clown girl lying on her back, she too sleeps with a smile on her face and her big lips are thick with lipstick. Quakie and Baby come into view next, with Quackie sitting on her nest snoring with her arms crossed and Baby on a small playpen with her big pacifier in mouth and holding the rubber ducky and a ridiculously huge rattle on her hands.

The door opens and a slender figure hurries in turning on the lights and locking the door. A bald bleached woman that just took a shower walks around the clowns carefully looking for her clothes and folds open the dressing panel. Her quickly finely gloved hands fold it close again and she sits up on the bed to put on her deep purple floppy clown Mary Janes. She chuckles a little as she fidgets having some trouble finding her foot on her baggy suit and all the layers of ruffles on her neck blocking a good chunk of her view down. When finished, she flops her way to the mirror and once in front of it, she pulls out of her sleeves in theatrics some cosmetics. She fixes her lashes, adds in some blush, and puts on her lipstick. She admires herself for a moment after that, then she finally reached for her name tab to place it on the left side of her breast, it read Pollyanna, and the pink and purple Pierrot now stood fully suited and prepared to spread joy for the day! She giggles and poses, still admiring herself, and then she puckers up and kisses her reflection!

She turns around with a hop and gleefully sees the other clowns still sleeping, she giggles again but composes herself and puts on a face of seriousness looking silly in such total clown regalia. She pulls out a small green honker and presses it, magically emitting the sound of a ship's horn and in an instant all the clowns bolted awake startled, running around comically bumping into each other! They only stopped once Pollyanna was done laughing, looking at how her squad had been reduced to an alley of stupid clowns, she then composed herself again. "Clowns!" - she said in a firm tone, they all stopped and had her attention in mid-action. "Today we begin our new calling and all the prospects have arrived! Their parents are also here, meaning that you are to behave! We're expected to finish here at 14 hours, Sweetie Biggie will arrive and we'll have the Birthday Bash and some cake! After that...I'll no longer be your commander. We've all been sold to different circuses..." - some gloom takes over the room after hearing this. "That means that this is all your final mission!" - she smiles again regaining her joy! "We've come very far and you ladies have all become the most beautiful clowns in the world! Make me proud!"

She then sees all the clowns recover their cheer and run up to the lock door, stupidly piling themselves up!

"This was *your name here, lady*!..." - the voice of the mirror narrates a film detailing the wonderful journey of you developing into clownhood in a large A/V hall full of restrained and shocked young people, their parents stood by dressed (but not transformed) like clowns looking on approvingly. The film showed incomplete college years diverting into your transformation from sexy co-ed sorority girl to an inflated bozo and your new life, bouncing around from circus to circus, female ring leaders grabbing hold of you for big kisses before tossing you out on the stage with the rest of the more established clowns zeroing in on you for pranks to delight the spectators, and how with each passing presentation your personality kept evolving into that of a gigantic clueless dopey goofball of a clown!

Mini sat on the last row of the room and swamped with kisses her boyfriend, until the film ended and the rest of the crew finally pranced in!
15232222211211221112221122121.title: And on and on!

choices: The re-education is about to begin!
152322222112112211122211222.content:
New Quackie kept drifting along within the world inside the magic mirror, something dragged the carpet ride that was her nest in a bizarre light blue atmosphere full of colorful polka dots. She wouldn't stop struggling to break free and kept quacking incessantly until finally, through her beak she clearly blurted out the words: "I'm not a duck!"

Bars fall down, the nest is inside a caged dome! She looks around, she's in the corner of a large arched pink room with rows of wooden blue seats. It's a clowned church! And all the attendants, clowns, jesters, and Pierrots of all kinds are staring right at her for a minute! They then give their attention back at the altar where a huge statue of Buddy Jesus imposes itself before three women, normal looking women, on their knees giving smiling silent prayers to the tune of calliope music coming from a keyboard!

When finished, they are then willingly escorted by three female jesters in ceremonial aprons depicting clowned pictures of Candice Bergen, Clara Bow, and Doris Day to barber stools in front of make-up mirrors with washers right next to where New Quackie landed. She is infinitely horrified to what she sees next: the women sit, they patiently wait as they wrap their bodies in a yellow blanket with colorful polka dots, comb their hair one last time before the jesters proceeded to cut every square inch of it! They used scissors, they used electric razors, and finally they place the shaving cream and gently wipe the last trace of it leaving them completely bald! After washing it off, they predictably react surprised to the end result but just laugh it off nervously. "Now now, you baldie balds!" - the jesters warn and coo. "You've just made your vows!"
"I-I know, I just!..." - one of the women says.
"Hair is a source of pride and vanity, and clowns like yourselves have to be free from that! You are to become an adorable, magical personification of humility that only thinks of making others happy!"
"Yeah hey..." - another woman says composing herself. "...could we please hurry to that 'magical' part?"
"Absolutely, baldieface!" - and the make up begins! The blankets come off and from the top of their heads to the neck area not covered by their cardigans they are buried in white! Their new dresses come rolling in as they put in details such as big tears, blush, round rosy cheeks, arched round eyebrows, and their new red round noses. They stand and begin to undress themselves as the dressing boards are set up. Moments pass, New Quackie can see them wearing their new blue floppy shoes and the white ruffles. The dressing boards wave themselves down again, and the women have disappeared. In their place stand 3 huge clowns in their baggy teal jumpsuits with white star patterns, two huge buttoned up cotton balls, and ruffles for every sleeve, the neck one being the biggest and most ruffled! The audience reacts overjoyed with the transformation, even though no magic was involved (yet!). The new clowns are just as pleased with their results, one of them still a bit nervous, they make their bows and curtsy to the crowd on their delicate ceremonial gloves! They are also holding their old clothes and they prance their way back to the altar to deliver them to their jesters waiting! As soon as they hand them over they'll get rid of them so they may finally begin their new magical lives as hardcore clowns!

They bow down and present their clothes, the jesters take them away and come back with a final piece of garment, their pointy clown hats! They're big enough to cap their heads completely and are the same pattern as their suits with a big white cotton ball at the top. They bow down to face their masterpieces as they are almost finished. Artist and work stare at each other, the nervous one is pecked with a kiss on her lips. "There, there!" - she says to her. "This is it! There was no other way around! This is precisely what the world needs if you are to be a clown!" - and pecks her another kiss, this one on her nose and with the honking that comes with it, she feels even more insecure!
"Just do it already." - says again the one woman with the determined tone of voice.
"Okay, bozos..." - one of the jesters begins to instruct. "...gives us some of that dome!"

And in unison, they grab the bald heads and intently kiss their domes. It's seemingly a very concentrated part of the ritual as everyone in the room looks on in silence. When finished, they finally crown them. The new bozos lift up their heads, a new feature had been mysteriously added to their faces: a big red sad frown! The ritual was complete, the women had transformed into all-natural sad clowns! The audience roared in laughter as they stood up feeling rather confused and strangely sad! Without warning one of them attempts to run to the mirror and stumbles on her partner, knocking the three down, further delighting the audience! The three get on their feet and comically run all over the place not knowing what to do!
"Okay, dumby-dumb dumbs! First thing we should do is teach you how to kiss like a clown!" - one of the jesters pulls a sad clown out and wraps her lips on hers! She passes her around her 2 colleguas and is further subjected to huge kisses! Another one was swallowed by the audience and they celebrate the birth of their bretheren treating her to pies, soda canisters, eggs, kicks to the butt, and every other perk of her new life! She feels nothing but utter shock at first, but slowly she understands it's everything she was ever to be coming to completion!

The third one made it to the mirror and stares at herself quietly. She feels herself, she feels her suit and her pointy hat. She feels her face and her painted frown, she gives her nose a honk. After that, behind that sad face New Quackie can tell she's actually smiling, she poses in front of the mirror and acts her own lips into a frown blinking rapidly trying to look cute!

She then stares at New Quackie...
152322222112112211122211222.title: Ye of jester's faith!

choices: They are looking at Baby's husband!
They are looking at Baby's daughter!
1523222221121122111222112221.content:
"And who might you be??" - the sad clown asks posing with a sudden high pitch helium tone of voice, she keeps frowning in character, but slowly the character drains her identity!
"Oh" - a jester says and New Quackie hears the cage being opened and turns to face her approach. "This, is supposed to be your ride! Tragically, she's not up for it yet!" - and she removes her beak, instantly transforming her back to normal! "Don't fret, gang! A few minutes of Tender Love and Care will change her tune!" - she hears as she crawls out of the nest hole and through the hay, out the cage and facing the gaggle of clowns! Somehow, she finally gets angry and just smolders at them! She dismisses the clowns and turns for the church gates and as soon as she pushes to open, her left shoulder is dragged to face a female Pierrot drinking from a bottle. As soon as that happens the Pierrot spits right at her face, former New Quackie reacts shocked but before she can do anything her arms are suddenly grabbed by two other females of the same clown species and the sad clown watches as she's whisked away through a pink heart-shaped dungeon!

The church doors slam shut and suddenly the jester removes the pointy hat of the sad clown to place on her shoulders a collar with a large sign for her chest that reads '1'. The second jester found her way there and is holding New Quackie's beak, she turns to the crowd and whistles. "Could I please have the dumb-dumb over here?" - she calls out, and the crowd disperses to make way for the second sad clown they had so much fun playing around with. With a cartoonish listless and worried look on her face, she slowly squeaks her way through. Suddenly somehow, her suit split into 2 at the bottom, revealing huge diapers and making her once again comically stumble for everyone present! Amidst the burst of laughter she quickly gathers herself pulling the lower half up, magically making it a one piece baggy suit again and panics all the way to her waiting jester to receive a number and a kiss on her bald head. "That was just beautiful!" - the jester sweetly compliments! They both kiss until the third sad clown was simply walked there by the third jester whimpering like a pup. They looked like a married proud clown couple although you couldn't tell they were both actually female! The worried sad clown had kiss marks all over her head! She receives #3 and then the trio are sat down on the last row of seats.
"Hey!" - sad clown #2 then asks. "We have numbers, but what about names?? I haven't found out what my new clown name is yet!"
"Oh ho, no no no, silly!" - and one of the jesters begins to explain. "You 3 are a certain special case! Remember your vows? You are at our service! You are clowns for us clowns, and you only get your true name and an upgrade that won't make you look as plain as you do right now at our says-so!"
"How long does that take?" - sad clown #1 turned to ask, though after she did a thought kicked on her mind that she doesn't need to know a thing like that!
"It varies. It could be days, it could be weeks, months, years, decades! Remember you're not human anymore, you're just 3 adorable little sad clowns! You have nothing but magic inside of you that is meant to preserve you like this forever! And if that should be the case then that's how it'll be, leaving you to only be addressed as 'silly', 'dumb-dumb', 'moron', 'chrome dome' and such!"

They're interrupted by the church doors reopening, and former New Quackie is smiling! Her new friend promised she would look just beautiful as her duck and the retransition is almost complete! She's wearing a bright new long sleeved green baby doll dress with pink polka dots and her feet are webbed again! Only her hair and face are left, Pierrot holds her hand and leads her to a stool! She is seated, wrapped, shaved, washed, and bleached! When finished, Pierrot gently kisses her white dome and ties her big bonnet on!
"Okay everyone this is it!" - one of the jesters announces and the sad clowns bolt to their large floppy feet and comically panic! The jester holding Quackie's beak then pries it open and holds it up to her side. "Let's go! Let's go now!" - she says as the sad clowns run up to the beak in numeric order and get magically sucked into the tiny device as it were a clown car! "Hurry it up you 3! You've got a big load of work on your hands right now! Constant work! Only food and sleep are enough rest for you! 2 whole worlds to bring smiles to, never time to relax!"
The third and last hesitates nervously, it whimpers non-stop. "What is wrong with you you stupid creature?! In! Now!" - and one of the jesters angrily kicks her right in! The beak is then shut tight and the Pierrot claims it, she walks over to New Quackie still seated highly anticipating the transformation coming to completion!
"Are you ready, my friend?" - she asks before pressing her beak in.
"Oh yes! I've been ready for this moment my entire life!"
"Very well then..." - and she is outfitted with her beak! "You've renounced your sentient human life. You are now just one more being in this world of pure joy and love."

And that's when it happened, first the sleeves bursted with white feathers rounding them up and a thick collar of it on her neck. Then, her body inflated, similar to all her friends waiting back at the mansion! In a flash, she reappears there, lightheaded, without no absolute idea of what just happened. Her arrival is met with silence however, all the clowns are staring out the window. Baby has taken off her bonnet and pacifier and is right in front looking down with a worried expression on her face that all but confirmed she was out of character...

Whatever is happening??
1523222221121122111222112221.title: Re-quacked!

choices: Now then, big clowns call for big tasks!
Oh wait, something's up with Quackie!
15232222211211221112221122211.content:
Hector, musclebound redhead spy husband of recently clowned teammate Vicky...has entered the Clown Room! He finds it empty, no sign of jumbo clowns, ducks, or big babies. Seems just like an ordinary room with a fixation on clowns, the windows are closed and a huge plush clown doll lies up between the curtains. He walks up to investigate, it's a fuzzy yellow ape-ish bodice though all the sleeves are pink ruffles. On the legs there's large light blue sneakers, on her hands soft white gloves, on the head a whiteface clown. It's not only bald, but coneheaded! A huge round red nose, a large black smile frame on her lower lip and covering the jaw, long dark arches for eyeborws that extend to the mid of the cone! The eyes are closed and it's got some really silly long yellow lashes. Hector gives the nose a honk, he doesn't react surprised to see the clown open its eyes and give him a giggly smile.
"Okay get up bozo, before I kick your ass back to Clowntopia..." - he calmly threatens. (!?)
"Honey it's me!" - the bozo reveals herself out of character, and her husband is taken aback and suddenly, jumped by you and your two goofballs sisters! Girly squeals of delight are heard, along with clothes getting ripped, kisses, and ignored calls for help with these clowns! "Stop it! Stop it!" - Vicky calls out and manages to pull you all off, leaving him completely naked, covered in kisses, and bleached! "Oh for Pete's sake..." - she complains pulling out what looks like a brown plastic coconut, pries it open on top of his head and water pours down washing off the kiss marks! Biggie dries him up and gives him a playful spank on the tushy giggling! "Here!" - Vicky then offers him a new garment to wear. it's folded but it's fuzzy and pink!
"V-vicky! You're a clown!" - he calls out in shock covering his genitals completely ignoring his new suit.
"Yes baby, a goofy gorilla bozo to be exact. That way I can be one of the silliest on the planet and stay in shape. Now you, you're naked! Put this on now, you get to be one too and you're embarassing me in front of the family!"
"W-what?! N-no! Vicky, my God, just look at you! You look!...You look!..."
"Stupid?" - she asks, putting her offering down. She then slowly gets close to him and catches him off guard for a hug. "Yeah baby, I'm well aware of that little fact, I look pretty stupid..." - she adds pressure! "I look just ridiculous. And look at my head! The worse part? It's permanent!" - the pressure on this bearhug is unlike anything Hector had ever felt before in his life! He always knew his wife was strong, but this was just insane! How did this happen?! What kind of twisted curse had given her this strenght and not him?! "Hector, listen to me..." - she whispers into his ears. "It's worth it!" - and she takes the pressure off! Catching his breath, Hector receives his new suit and in befuddlement begins to dress. His hands and feet go through the ruffled yellow sleeves, these with the addition of a tiny pink bow on each. The zipper is in the back, obviously his loving wife will help him with that. "Oh wait, almost forgot..." - she says first and pulls out what looks like a plastic toy banana.
"W-what is it?..." - he nervously asks.
"Pipe down! It's time for your banana!" - she jokes and plugs his ass with it! He gives out a girly "Ooooh!" with his lips rounded perfectly in response! As soon as he's zipped up he's seated in the bed and lets the clowns finish prepping him up. He dons his new soft gloves, he's fitted with girly white sneakers, and you playing with the rubber ducky again shear off his mane! Vicky playfully fixes his makeup, identical to hers! "By the way, dear..." - she says as she puts away what she needed and they stare at each other's faces. "My name's Bananas now...would you like to be this clown's partner in crime??" - she asks giggling and presenting him with his new red orb of a nose!
"Y-yes!" - he says, in a submissive, helium pitched tone! She fits it in and they kiss! As they do this, the ducky sticks right on top of his bold surface by the beak and you try to pull it out. It's really in place so you pull hard.
"Ah cripes! Not this agan!" - you act out complaining and smiling as you pull harder and the cone takes shape! Finally it snap loose, making you fly away from the scene like a cannonball, thankfully New Duckie breaks your fall! Somehow, at the tip of his cone a tiny pink bow was in place!
"Hello there, Coco!" - Bananas greets the new clown!
15232222211211221112221122211.title: A woman named Bananas!

choices: Now then, time for another clown hunt!
152322222112112211122211222112.content:
Not like any of you care since you're having loads of fun with this new clown! You laugh and play a game of leapfrog, any clown's turn to jump on Coco results in squashing 'her' and rubbing hips, feeling the banana in place! "Quack, quack..." - she complains feeling lightheaded but you still all ignore her in the cheers and quasi-bozo femenization. "Quack...quack!..." - she screams and suddenly, inflates even more finally getting your attention as she balloons up twice her size along with her arms and legs until finally, she bursts with a loud pop that scatters you all across the room in confusion! Once things settle you all look around and discover 3 giant eggs in the center of the room and a new clown! Biggie and the apes recognize her standing in her new big floppy yellow clown boots in front of the mirror fixing up her big new yellow bowtie wearing a tight and seductive baby blue catsuit with yellow duckie patterns! Her face was bleached and had round red cheeks painted on, her hair grew back as a reward for making the delivery and it was short and light blue! She then out of her gloved sleeves made a yellow bowler hat appear and fitted it with a smile before the mirror opened up to her and she happily walked back in!

The mirror closes up, the eggs start to hatch, and pink mist fills the room! The clowns get blinded and they start coughing up feeling chocked by the mist! They try walking around with their arms up trying to get a feel of their surroundings, Coco and Bananas find each other easily and just hold on to each other while you and the other 2 goofballs reach the bed. The second you touch it something weird happens and you feel a sudden jolt of pleasure all over your body! You all moan, like ladies. You all 3 may be bozos true enough, but your ever sensitive lady parts react to this aroma filling the room have you swooning on a wonderful joyride that brings out the real lady clown in all of you!

The mist dissipates, the apes discover something shocking had happened in the bed area! It had become a 3 manned harem circus act with the 3 goofballs posing around hilariously trying to look sexy in their balloon outfits! These had all changed into a Valentine's day variation, white with small red hearts, all their hair (other than yours, of course) had changed to that red coloration and your red noses had been replaced by tiny hearts at the tip of your former human noses. Red lipstick in your lips, big wavy lashes, and sparkly tiny hearts as freckles you all lay around carefree seductively, and then from the floor the sad clowns rose up! They began their act looking around worried and jittery! "Oh! Oh! Now where could we be??" - one of them whinned.
"I don't know! Oh dear me and we were told we had a lot of work to do!"
"We, we!..." - one of them struggled, not squeaking, breaking spell and character. "We're back home!..."
The other 2 react to this looking at each other for a moment and then looking at her. "My God, now's our chance! We've got to put a stop to this before it's too late again! We've got to!..."
"Ahem!" - she's interrupted by you fixing your throat. "Hey boys, you all look so...funny!" - you blow a kiss at one of them, a cloud of pink mist shaped like a heart flies to the nose making it honk and suddenly, the sad clown becomes entranced by your inflated charms! Shakes the head getting into character before putting the moves on you the best way a sad clown knows how, walking up to you the head down in pity and making a flower appear in his hands offering it to you, worrying sad about rejection! Ypu blink rapidly at the sad clown showing off your lashes and accept the floor, in a theatric taking a sniff at it, you then grab hold of the clown and start kissing! The sad clown that had broken character then stands shocked watching the other one also with a flower in his hands removing the petals.
"She loves me, oh she loves me not!" - the sad clown would squirm until Jumbo took out from her mouth colorful stringed hankercheifs and made a lazo to pull the sad clown over and eat it up in kisses!
"Oh my God no not again..." - completely out of character and in the tone of a normal woman's voice the remaining sad clown said before that spectacle and made a break for the door. She bumps into Biggies tummy as she stands in her way holding a heart shaped box of chocolates and Valentine's day balloons!
"Hey there, handsome!" - she says and she giggles.
"Get the Hell out of my way, you mutant!" - the not-so sad clown demands as it strggles back up and Biggie looks at her confused.
"Dude that the Hell's wrong with you?" - she asks. "You're breaking character!"
"I'm not gonna be some cartoon character for you to play jokes on! I'm not a clown, I'm a woman! Now get out of the way!"
"Oh that, pssh!..." - Biggie says shaking her head. "It's cool darling I don't swing that way either! It's just the way the magic works! Now then, pucker them up, Goofy!" - she says puckering up herself and readying for a kiss.
"If you think that I will put my lips on yours than you are!..." - she stops midsentence and a little lightbulb goes off in her head as she had just realized something. "What did you call me?"
"Goofy!" - she giggles. "You look so silly, trying to act tough like some babe you're clearly not! Newsflash you big dummy, you're no lady no more standing there in those big floppy shoes, wearing that jumpsuit and sporting that thinking cap on your baldie bald bleacho head! You look goofy! You're Goofy, Goofy, Goofy the Clown" - she mocks and keeps giggling while the newly baptized Goofy the Clown discovers her name tag on her chest and a rush of inner clown strenght and magic! "Hey everyone, watch out: Goofy the Clown's in town! Aw, just look at that big red frown!" - Biggie rhymes, Goofy shakes her head and finally, enters character matching her sad expression and blinking at Biggie! "Oh you are seriously killing it here sister..." - Biggie reacts her new friend with privileges Goofy the Clown embracing her.
"Rrrrrrrrrrrrready to close curtain??" - Goofy squeaks.
"Take me home." - and they kiss! With the act completed, the apes are treated to another burst of magical bright lights eminating from the clowns and their hot dates! The result of this one is, 3 large rubber balls in the room colored just like the goofballs on their default outfits and 3 normal women...the goofballs without their suits and makeup!
"You stupid cow!..." - 'you' say to 'Biggie' and approach her angrily as she regarded herself. "Listen to me and get it through your thick skull: we've been clowned! That means no more shopping mall or frapuccinos or politics or drunken a-hole male strippers! This coven made an oath, we are not a part of that world anymore!"
"Yeah dammit, what's the big deal?! You can get us all killed if you pull a stunt like that again and go breaking the coven's oath!" - the other girl also remarks.
"You are a clown now! Yes you're bald and you look stupid and everyone's treating you like crap, deal with it! The fact of the matter is right now there is more magic flowing through your veins than ever and it's all means to an end!"
"You're right..." - 'Biggie' calmly answers wanting to shut you up. "I'm a clown, Goofy the Clown..." - and she presents her name tag to her stunned friends! "Are you a clown too? How fun, and you look so young! What's your name kid? Wanna be my Junior Joey?"
152322222112112211122211222112.title: Oh wait, something's up with Quackie!

Sweetie for some reason gasps covering her mouth but then reacting confused again looking at her gloves, Quakies quacks madly confirming the sighting. "Oh thank God! Hold on, Rose! Your curtain call is soon!..." - the mirror then says in a strange tone thinking out loud. "Quickly you bozos, no time to waste! Sorry to rush your spell Biggie but you must start working right now!" - and suddenly a think yellow neck ruffle collars Sweetie Biggie, making a snapping sound as it locked in and sending her mind on another haze that leaves her beaming with a big smile on her surprised face! "As of this moment, you are now both clowns! Not people performing as clowns, but true clowns! You're no longer people anymore, you're no longer even female. You may have some female traits, but you're full-blown bozos so it's just how you've been made to look silly!" - out of nowhere on both clowns' right hands colorful balloons inflate and are held by strings in their gloves! They marvel at this pleasant surprise, and then rub bellies and noses giggling! "You have clown shoes and noses, disproportionate bubbly bodies and buried in make-up to make you look silly! You look silly because you are now meant to only spread joy in your adorable lives! That is your new mission, your new calling! Now this girl, she's a clown-to-be, and she must join the fold! She'll resist, and you'll discover that she can perform magic, but it will not work on you! She's very confused and scared, and that's why you will bring her here!"

You then both nod comically and prance away to hunt that new clown!
152322222112112211122212.title: "Take me there!"

You're on a full-scale clownhunt, and it felt so awesome! Quackie leads the way while you and your brand new bestest pal in the whole wide world Sweetie prance and skip away giggling! Your new balloons are just so much fun, and you also took the rubber ducky with you along for the ride! Quackie then prompts you to pipe down arriving at the room and be prepared, she's gonna go in first so she does this neat magic trick of morphing into her meanie looking old self back again to get Rose to come out, and that's when you'll surprise her! So she goes in and you 2 wait, you can hardly contain yourselves holding in all your laughter, this is gonna be sweet! Sweetie comically places her head on the door to listen in and then, the door right across opens up! An unsavory looking juvenile chick with a mohawk and a bikini with some tanning gear and towels in a basket comes out and is shocked on her feet to see you 2 bozos! "Oh shit, Rose, your mom's he-!..." - she manages to exclaim but you were too distracted to care by this damsel's cuteness sealing your lips with hers and slamming her back in! Sweetie giggles stupidly with the sudden change of plans placing a colorful 'BOZOS IN LOVE, DO NOT DISTURB! ~♥' tag with chibi toon drawings of yourselves with your balloons on the doorknob outside and walking in! The mohawked punk struggles as you still got her pinned down and squeezing out magic through your cartoon smooch that already has her whole body bleached! Sweetie then shoves you aside.
"Bombs away!" - she declares before throwing her inflated pink bod at the chick once twice and thrice with bursts of laughter!
"Okay Sweetie, that's enough big bombs for today, tee hee!" - you pull her up and then both of you help the exhausted mohawk back on her feet and sit her up on the bed. "Come on sport, here you go, here!" - you pull out of nowhere a piña colada for her to drink and recover a bit from that rough act! She then notices another straw, it's the rubber duck sharing the drink! Sweetie then blows a bundle of audible mock kisses! "Break time's over you clowns, more kissing!" - and you shove the duck into her face where her lips meet his magic rubber lips and kiss! she struggles again at first but in indignation and noticeably upset she grabs the duck and keeps taking in all the magic bitterly accepting the spell!
"Grr, where is it!?" - she asks the duck placing the stud on the bed.

"You have got to be kidding me!" - she reacts in a shocked nauseated disgust!
"Nope! You're going as a happy little woodland critter!" - and mohawk grumbles on as she suits up, feeling all the plush and soft fabric taking hold, bonding with her skin. This was not the weekend she had planned out, now she has to wait for her friends to save her from this embarassing new adventure loaded with clowns! The bozos right now with her notice the hesitation to pull the front zipper up so Sweetie helps her with that locking her in, forming a big blue heart sewn at the center of the belly similar to her mittens and footing! You make that awful hair disappear using the duck again! Her new bald dome snuggly fits into the teddy bear hood with the hearts sewn on the ears! She worries as she feels her head and the hood merging! Then out of the rubber duck's beak a new fabric is produced and she watches helplessly as you collar her with her new thick blue neck ruffle with yellow wavy lines and polka dots!
"W-wait..." - she feels something as the collar snaps in and panics. "No...no! Not this, take this off!" - and her mittens struggle uselessly with the ruffle in place! You then both sit her down on the bed again and look on at her, she finally seems scared.
"There there, dear..." - you say diving down to kiss her forehead, with your normal tone of voice as if you were possessed.
"You're just becoming a clown is all..." - Sweetie does the same, kissing her nose. You then both eskimo kiss until you start giggling in your loony tone of voice, in the blink of an eye you dive and both give a big kiss to the bear on her cheeks!

And her new red round nose finally squeaks out!

You both high-5 each other in rejoycing and help her deadweight back up for a quick ring-around-the-rosie that further scrambles her mind!

Rose looks on alarmed, grabs Quackie still in her human form and runs!

"Wh-what's gonna happen to her?" - Quackie sheepishly asks standing aside watching her.

But I'm not letting either happen!..." - she then finally turns on the lights to see Quackie, fully transformed! They both jump with the shock, then Rose notices confusion on the duck clown's face.

Rose reaches the front door and wildly opens, the first thing she sees is handsome blonde male in the same shiny blue tight suit as Sweetie had been wearing before her transformation. "Rose!" - he grabs hold of her shoulders concerned.
"Ernest! Oh man thank the gods you're here! We have to leave!"
"What's going on!? Do you know where Rachel is!?" - they discuss walking up to a surveillance van.
"I have no idea, she's probably been bleached and running around wearing the floppy shoes and a big red nose on her face! The clowns are here, Ernest! The mirror is here, and we're too late! There's already more than one bozo prancing around and if we don't leave now, we'll be next! You have to call your people and warn every wizard in the westcoast!"
"Okay got it! Let's go! But first thing's first!..." - and as if on cue Quackie backs up turning back into a duck readying herself, Ernest slides the van doors open and a menagerie of Pierrot women greeting Rose with smiles and joy! "...welcome to your new life, Rose!" - Ernest declares with a pitch of helium in his voice! Before she can react, Rose gets a quick kick in her ass from Quackie to an unnatural bubbly effect stunning her run, takes a soda siphon and cream pie blast combo to the face, and finally a little smack in the head from a mallet that gently knocks her down to a magical cartoon effect that has her seeing little birdies! Between the chirping birds she watches as her vision fades out Ernest and a golden Pierrot in full romantic embrace, the pack of bozos then closes in cutting her from that view beaming with smiles right down, and finally Quackie landing on her.

"A rose by any other name..." - a gentle female voice wakes her up with those words, she can feel herself wearing only her underwear, seated on the ceremonial pink inflated clown couch, and restrained in her arms and legs. Her hands already fitted with the soft white parade gloves canceling out any attack spells. She's in the Clown Room and you're sitting right in front of her in the bed, Sweetie and the Pierrots join you, smiles all around looking on at something behind you.

"Dashing young man, so handsome and proud. Would you like to drop everything??" - she recites caressing his face. "How would you like to be a clown?? How would you like the walk of a loon, the suit of a fool, the face of a buffoon?? No vanity, no riches! Just smiles and laughs, all the laughs at you and only you! Would you like that?? Would you drop everything handsome and proud young man, drop everything and be a clown??"
"Yes!..." - Ernest answers very determined. "My body is ready!"
The gold Pierrot then proceeds to fasten on his neck a golden magical lock! Sparkling light then cascades his entire body and the shining continues until you all start hearing the squeaks! It started with his bubbly big red clowns shoes, the lock then changed shape and inflated into a red collar! The sparkle stops and he now stands before them on a blue clown jumpsuit patterned with yellow stars and swirls, it also inflates like yours and Sweetie's! The Pierrot then caresses his face with both hands making his dark long arches for clown eyebrows magically appear, as well as a big long red smile wrapped on his face! She then crowns him with a long matching pointy clown hat with yellow puffballs! "Welcome to the fold, brother..." - she says introducing him to his new red nose, he receives it and she kisses the tip. "Go now..." - she whispers into his ear. "The procession has begun for you, go forth..." - he receives his balloons and he does his squeaky march towards mirror and right into Clown World! "You beautiful spellcaster, so wise and beautiful!..." - the Pierrot begins the rite on Rose next. "Would you like to drop everything?? How would you like to be a clown??..."

Will Rose be a clown??
