15232222211211222.title: Prank her!

152322222112112221.title: Hit her with a cream pie!

1523222221121122211.content:
You wind up and... *splat*! You smush the pie right in her sleeping face! She jolts straight up in the bed, confused and surprised by the creamy awakening. The cream and crust slowly slide down her face as she sits, blinking and bewildered. You let out a cartoon-ish giggle, greatly amused by her sticky situation. She clears the cream from her eyes and spots you for the first time. You give her a sheepish grin and start whistling an innocent tune as she glowers at you, both hands hiding two more pies behind your back.

"Was that your idea of a joke, clown?!" She says angrily. Despite her tone of voice, you can see a trace of amusement sparkling in her eyes.

"Yup!" You giggle, "Didn't you find it funny?"

"Hmm..." She contemplates, hands on hips, "It could have been funnier."

"Really?" You pout exaggeratedly, your clown features looking ridiculous, "Looks like I need some practice. Let's try again!"

You pull the second pie out from behind you and bring it back, ready to throw. She puts her hands up, trying to stall you.

"Wait!" She cries, and you...
1523222221121122211.title: *Splat*!

choices: She looks like she needs one more pie!
15232222211211222111.content:
You hesitate, and the still-creamy girl lets out a sigh of relief.

"Whew! For a second there, I really thought you were going to let me have it!" She laughs. You smirk mischievously.

"Hold on a minute... what was that?" You prompt, wondering whether she would walk into such an obvious trick.

"I said," She repeats, obliviously, "I thought you were going to let me have it!!"

Your inner clown is delighted. This girl makes such a wonderful, hapless stoogette! Maybe just one more teeny prompt...

"One more time, just the last part?" You ask with faux sincerity, batting your long eyelashes.

Fists balled up at her sides, she tersely states, "Let. Me. Have it!!"

Your red clown mouth splits into a huge toothy grin as the exact implication of what she said dawns on her. "If you insist!" You reply gleefully. You throw the pie in one smooth motion before she has time to react. It hits her directly in the face with a resounding *splat*! She stands as still as a statue for 5 seconds while you break into another fit of the giggles, then she exhales sharply, splattering the cream around her mouth and nose over you slightly.

"Careful!" You say, in between laughs, "This is a new outfit!"

She clears her eyes for the second time and tries to give you a dirty look, but this time it's even *more* amused. "You....!!" She starts, with an air of over-dramatic, haughty indignation...
15232222211211222111.title: Continue pranking her!

152322222112112221111.content:
You arch an eyebrow and produce the final pie from behind your back, which distracts her from her previous indignation. 'Not bad,' You think, 'One more time, just for giggles.'

"Right, that one is ending up in your face. Hand it over, Bozo!" She demands, extending her hand for the pie you're holding just out of her reach.

"Could you repeat that, please?," You ask, eagerly anticipating a slip-up.

"Don't play coy with me! I want you to give me that pie!" She splutters, bits of pie crust flying off of her.

"Anything you say!" You squeak with a giddy smile. You step forward past her waiting hand, and...*splat*! You carefully push the pie into her face. The crust splits in half, stuck to both sides of her cream-covered face.

You step back to admire your handiwork, grab the girl's still extended hand and give her a bawdy handshake. She remains motionless, covered in cream and disbelief.

"I always wanted a little stoogette of my own to walk into all my pranks!" You gleefully exclaim to her as you lead her toward the exit, your arm thrown over her still cream-covered shoulder. You hear a faint giggle from under all the cream as you step through the door...
152322222112112221111.title: Sidekick!

152322222112112221112.content:
She stands up in a huff, advancing towards you. When she's one step away, her foot suddenly flips on some runoff pie cream, sending her crashing into you. You fall backwards, and with a big *squelch*, the final pie you were hiding behind you squishes straight into your left butt cheek.

You roll over and feel the sensation of the girl peeling what's left of the pie off your bottom. She walks up next to you, and you giggle out, "In my defense, you did say 'Let me have it' around a clown. What could be more deserving of a pie in the...mmmmmmmmmrfffpfpffp!!!"

She rolls her eyes as you were speaking, and smashes the pie in your face before you could finish the thought. Rude!!

Just before she leaves, you ask her "So, was that last bit any funnier?" She harrumphs in a scrooge-like manner and storms out the door.
152322222112112221112.title: Your comeuppance is due!

15232222211211222112.content:
"Why?" You ask, still ready to throw.

"Uhhhhhh... " She stalls, trying to think of a reason that will keep her clean (...ish). Suddenly, she gets an idea, "What's in those pies? I'm terribly allergic to lemons!"

Oh no! You had better check to see if there are any lemons in these pies! You bring the pie back in front of you, lean in and take a big whiff, trying to detect any lemony essence. "No, no," She says, "You need to check reaaaaaaaally close!"

'Of course,' You think. You give a giant, comically over-exaggerated sniff that causes you to throw your head back. The momentum dislodges the pie from it's tin and it lands with a timid *splut* straight on your face.

"Oh my!" She giggles, clearly amused by your clumsiness.

'Great idea,' You think to yourself, 'I should taste it to discover the flavor!' You lick the pie cream off your lips, and say "Mmm, ..."
15232222211211222112.title: The easily fooled prankster

152322222112112221121.content:
"...Lemon!" You exclaim, pie slowly sliding down your face "Oh well! No more pies for you, I guess!"

"Silly clown, I made that up to trick you into pieing yourself. I'm not allergic to lemons, see?" She says, as she swipes a dollop of cream off your face to lick. "Mmm, tasty!!"

This new information gives you a big smile, which causes some of the cream to fall off your face, restoring your eyesight. You pull the last pie into her view. "Oh, excellent! I was just trying to come up with things to do with this last pie. Now I know!"

"Wai...!!!" She shouts with her arms extended, trying to block your throw, but you curve the pie around her arms, thrusting it against the right side of her face. It covers the right half in a thick, sticky layer of white, giving her a stark contrast between the clean(er) half of her face.

"I should have seen that coming," She sighs. So you...
152322222112112221121.title: About face!

"... Coconut! My favorite!" You exclaim happily, "Now you'll be able to fully enjoy this one!" You bring your last pie into view and start clumsily swinging it about near the girl. Ducking, the girl tries to think her way out of her just desserts.

Taking the case off her pillow, she says, "Whoa, settle down there! You can't see anything, so that pie is going to hit me in the shoulder. Wouldn't that be a terrible waste of your last pie?"

She hands you her pillowcase to clear off your face, and you give her the pie for safekeeping. Just as you finish , you say "Gee thanks, missy! What a great idea!"

"I know," She says, stepping forward and putting a hand on the back of your head, "I can't believe it worked!" With that, she smashes the pie into your face with a big *splat*. She grinds the pie back and forth into your face, and with each new twist comes a little *beep* from your clown nose.

Finally satisfied, she steps back casts a critical eye on her work. She totally plastered you! You, being extremely sticky...
152322222112112221122.title: "Coconut"

Your nose goes off, she stopped you by reaching out and honking it without you noticing it! She then opens her eyes and out of nowhere smacks you with her own cream pie! She then takes yours from your hands and smacks you a second time! She then pulls out her own soda syphon and douses you with it so hard that you finally fall on your big honking balloony butt! Befuddled and shocked beyond belief you being wiping yourself the cream off, your nose honks during that action and you stopped confused after hearing that for some reason. You palm it again making it honk softly and feeling it out as your own skin with your finely white gloved hands. You gasp noticing that now, how did you end up wearing them?? You then take a feel of your inflated outfit in complete shock and panicking. "W-what's going on?!" - you ask in the dark and gasp again after hearing your helium voice.

Seems like you have no recollection of what's been happening since you walked into this room don't you??

The lights come on and in front of the mirror now stands...
1523222221121122212.title: We know these tricks, bozo!

15232222211211222121.content:
Before you she stands, smiling, clad in a tight jester variation of the clown suit you are wearing from head to toe. Her exposed face between the dangling 2 jingle bells of her cap bleached and made up for theatrics. She begins with a pose and tip-toes like a ballerina giggling towards you still in the floor confused to no end, once she's at your face you notice she seems to be as old as you and has peculiarly similar facial features you should have if you could only disarm yourself from this big nose and make-up. She bows down at you with her arms to the sides looking at you in delight. "Hey!" - she greets in a sweet tone of voice and continues marveling at you silently. Slowly, something from within you starts appreciating that attention and try to crack a smile back. But then she quickly pecked you a kiss on your nose and you react surprised to it again, seeing this makes her laugh and that's when she threw herself all over you! You're on your back on this bloated balloony armor unable to get up with this jester wrapping her arms around you and bouncing off your tummy! Your helium voice begging her to stop only makes things funnier for her and she starts raving about what a fun big and bouncy clown you are! In the heat of the moment she calms a bit and you both stare at each other face to face. Smiling again she bit her lower lip, zoomed in on your own lips ever so slowly but you were still caught by surprise! And you just didn't know how to react, you've become a clown and another female is kissing you?! You finally had to put your (floppy) foot down taking action, you manage to pull her away to her own space and finally try to catch your breath for a change!
"L-listen girl..." - you try to say and you discover your normal tone of voice had returned with that. "I...I don't swing that way, alright? Sorry, I just...I just..."

"I'm not gay. I'm sorry, I'm, just, not, gay..."
"Wow what? Dude come on, you're a bozo now, a real loony toon brought to life! Nobody's gonna pay attention to that!"
"What? What are you talking about?" - you start feeling yourself out again. "How do I take this off?!" - you try pulling your gloves off to no avail, you search and pull for a way out of this inflated suit but...it starts to feel as if it were a part of you! The jester positions herself next to you still seated, she can tell by the look on your face that you're fearing the worse.

Suddenly...
15232222211211222121.title: She the jester!

152322222112112221211.content:
You're panicking, you've been transformed into a clown and felt deeply disturbed by it! You breathe heavy through your big red nose, heart pounding as the jester just sits there smiling looking at you in silent amusement. You struggle back to your big floppy shoes and continue feeling your transformed self shaking your head in denial and slowly start wobbling your way to the door without turning your back on the jester. "Welp!..." - she suddenly says jumping back to her feet. "You should probably be on your way, I'm really looking forward to your act with your running buddies!" she says as she walks up the bed and lies on her chest relaxing. "Then you and I are gonna have so much fun!..." You pay no attention to that and squeeze your way out the corridor again, you discover it's been decked out similar to the Clown Room, the entire mansion probably followed suit, with portraits of clowns hanging on the walls. You wobble your way through the corridor and suddenly at an intersection nearing the end you see a male figure that looks about your age.
"Oh no! No more clowns, please!" - he's panicking too, as if he's being chased, looks around nervously. A door behind him opens and there's a smiling female Pierrot with friends appearing, she quickly tackles him to the floor.
"I got him!" - she declares in a playful tone, and then you see not just her friends jumping down to join in on submitting him but nearby doors open with more of those clowns happily appearing as well to overtake him! One of them holds a yellow with blue polka dots clown jumpsuit and jumps into the giggling frenzy with it...
"Clothes off! Clothes off! What kind of clown dresses up like this??" - you hear one of them ask and you see the clothes the guy was wearing just fly away from the working crowd.
"N-n-no, give those back!"
"Oh, relax silly! We have something really cool for you to wear! Brand new shoes too to go along with it! Big, floppy, and simply the squeakiest!"
"And what's with this hairstyle?? Too hip, too stylish! A real clown's hair has to be ridiculous, and more colorful!" - you watch strands and locks of his brunnette fly off just like the clothes.
"Make up! Time for make up!"
"You are simply going to shimmer under the spotlight, bozo!"
"S-s-stop this!" - they say and they back away revealing their work to you. "I will not be a clown!"
"I don't think so, bubblebutt!" - and with that, the nearest Pierrot pops on him his new big red nose! The suit then explodes just like yours did and you see on his curly rat's nest also new blue hair his tiny pointy with a blue ball at the tip clown hop in the air and then back into place in the middle. "There, you're a clown now!"
"And that means new responsibilities!"
"And a big change of lifestyle!"
"That goes for you too!" - one of them says suddenly pointing at you! "Time now for a little re-education!" and you're both wacked on the head with a big cartoony mallet.

You wake up...
152322222112112221211.title: Clowns everywhere!

1523222221121122212112.content:
Your nose honks and you wake back up in an instant and fully alert! You're on your big feet in seconds in such a way that you wound up startling...yourself! In front of you is you! As a human, as a female, wearing even the same clothes that you wore on that fateful day! You stare at each other, befuddled and eye to eye! She then makes a big gulp and starts backing away nervously, wouldn't you in this bizarre situation?? You arrive at a big swanky mansion where they allowed you to stay the night, you wander into their backyard and right out there in the middle is a fully dressed jumbo-sized clown! Crazy shit! But hey considering those other clowns pulling up that pink circus tent...maybe you did something wrong waking that bozo up! You shouldn't be here, you most likely overstayed your welcome! Hurry back into the mansion, apologize to Lordy Lord Hugo and be on your way! Holy diver, why's that blimp chasing you?! Okay try bolting away, get some distance and, QUICK! The tent is up, go through there and then corner-

"Wait! Why are you, w-what are you!?..." - you scream and chase in confusion, not noticing what an amazing flexibility you're carrying yourself with wearing those big floppy shoes and inflated suit as if you had become a professional for these antics. Fact is of course, this was your body now. You loose sight of 'yourself' once she goes through the other end of the tent and the lights suddenly go out. You stop moving and look around confused until a spotlight then flashes on from up above and from the same direction in which 'you' had left, another figure returns. It seems to be another guy, this one blond and real well dressed, he looks aggravated and looking over his shoulder. Clowns must be chasing him as well, just like the other guy. They haven't caught him yet but distracted, he bumps right into your big jelly belly! The bump sends him to the floor and he lands on his ass gasping in surprise...which the audience finds hilariously funny and they explode into a ruckus of laughter! The lights come on, you're both on center stage! He can't see the delighted audience but he can see you now clear as day and his reaction goes from total shock marveling at your girth, to a ground pounding fit of rage at another irritable clown in front of him! "Get the fuck away from me, bozo!" - he demands.

You grin as soon as you realize it, and you get into character! And a ball of fire comes out of his hands.

These ones normal sized between your fellow jumbo but also whiteface, one of them wears baggy green overalls on a long-sleeved yellow shirt and white gloves and also, floppy green shoes. The audience in histerics, the jumbo's body drops smoking and black burned to a crisp, imediately he shakes it off and back into color and he looks at the apparent wizard that blasted him real mad! I will also then be presenting you the new star of our show and one of the biggest and greatest clowns in the entire world!"

They've entered Clown World! The trek literally is sunshine and lollipops under verdant grass and blue skies! The ride digs deep into the herd and suddenly stops among them. The confines holding down the ride come off and you're all free, you and the other clown with you look around and are suddenly overwhelmed with joy, you're among your brethren! You both start giggling at each other like goofballs, you bounce to press bellies and then Eskimo kiss before holding hands like happy clowns and prance away to explore and play! Toby, disgusted beyond words, keeps his guard up! Even though his hands are sealed he can still chant an incantation, so he has to tread on cautious waters before using that type of spell. "Toby!" - suddenly, he hears a female scream! He recognizes the voice and through the crowd of bozos she emerges, it's Gerda, a fellow wizard. Similar to Toby, she's a high maintenance platinum blonde party gal, and now also sporting the white gloves on the same predicament! "Toby oh thank the Ataros! Listen to me, your girlfriend Brie, she's-!" - and out of nowhere, a blue accordion of frilly ruffle collar locks itself in her neck as she was fast approaching! The Pierrot women then emerge for the capture on her feet and Toby instinctively runs away from what's about to happen!
"We'll hear none of it, young mage!..." - a Pierrot facing her coats the lips with a special red gloss. "You've abused your luxuries, your od will know the love of a clown!" - and the clown forcefully kisses the wizard! Her cheeks shine as comical red round squares form themselves, the gloss on the lips spreads like paint and eventually form a smile on her face! Her skin bleaches from top to bottom, but before more changes take hold a panel drops and encloses both women presenting a portrait of Gerda, her entire human profile.
"And thus a mage is no more!" - another Pierrot outside exclaims, ropes emerge from the panel which she and her kin then grab and begin to run circles around it laughing and cooing. The panel spins to a point of rising up in the air, as this happens the clown women pull the ropes away dropping them safely and hold hands forming a circle of their own, they next perform a silly ring-around-the-rosy dance, they hop, some kick their big floppy shoes up in the air, and they all smile and laugh at each other! The spinning stops and they do the same.
"Oh God, finally..." - one of them says, breaking character seemingly annoyed of having to do all that, they shush her but pay not much mind to it. The panel then slowly descends back on the ground presenting a new portrait: full body profile of Gerda as an inflated bozo! Her big clown nose was in place, and apparently went from stylish blonde hair to total yellow, the tips rising for a perfect clown-do! The jumpsuit white with blue polka dots, ruffles locking up every sleeve! A tiny comical hat with an antenna of a flower sticking out and big matching floppy pumps! The panel then falls away revealing the jumbo bozo feeling her changes out panicking!
"Young mage you've dropped everything! You've dropped everything and became a clown!" - the Pierrot that had transformed her proclaimed and honked her nose! Laughter ensues and Gerda's stomach dropped realizing her fate, they had finally done it, they had sealed her into a clown!

Toby kept running, the herd of big clowns seemed to have no end. Suddenly out of a corner of his eyes he sees her, his girlfriend Brie! A stunning Greek nosed Italianisima lady, now on a similar predicament wearing the white gloves! "Toby, quick, over here!" - she however commands, apparently in the middle of the distress she was in control of the situation! They finally emerged from the herd and headed into Clown World's most fabled magic forest! On a crossroads, they see a candy cabin to their left, and more clowns ready to pursue them to their right!

You nod.

"One....two.....three."
You awake.
